La señora Rumilda es mujer de 41 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio, venta de granos básicos, vive con su familia que esta formada por su esposo y sus 3 hijos; los cuales se encuentran estudiando su educación básica en la escuela. La señora Rumilda se preocupa por darles lo necesario a sus hijos, ya que manifiesta que ella no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y esta dispuesta a trabajar con todas sus fuerzas por verlos sueños de sus hijos cumplidos.  

Ella se de dedica al negocio de la venta de granos básicos, frijoles, café maíz. Ella tiene una experiencia de 10 años en el negocio, que aprendió de una tía, a la cual ella le ayudaba a vender en un puesto en el mercado desde hace 5 años; decidió poner su propia venta de granos básicos gestiono un puesto en el mercado y satisfactoriamente se le fue dado. Ella realiza el trabajo con ayuda de sus hijos cuando no tienen que estar en la escuela.  

El dinero sera utilizado, en la compra de granos para surtir y ampliar su puesto en el mercado y de esta manera dará un mejor servicio y gracias a ello mejorara sus ganancias económicas.

La meta mas grande que ella tiene, según manifiesta es la de apoyar a sus hijos hasta que ellos culminen sus estudios universitarios y con las ganancias del negocio ira ampliándose hasta tener un negocio de granos básicos mas surtido y formal.
texts.en:
Señora Rumilda is a 41 year old woman who works commercially selling basic commodities.  She lives with her family which includes her husband and three children who are completing their basic education studies in school.  Señora Rumilda is concerned to provide the necessities for her children because she did not have the opportunity to study.  She is willing to work with all of her strength to see her children's dreams fulfilled.  

She is engaged in the business of selling commodities, beans, coffee and corn. She has 10 years of experience in this business which she learned from an aunt who she helped for 5 years to sell goods in a stall at the market.  She decided to set up her own stall of commodities, and negotiated for a stall in the market which was satisfactorily provided.  She manages the work with help from their children when they do not have to be in school.

The money will be used to purchase commodities to supply and enlarge her booth in the market.  In this way she will offer better service and as a result improve her earnings.  Her overall goal is to support their children until they complete their university studies.  With the earnings she will expand until she has the largest assortment and most dependable business in the market.

loans.use: to purchase commodities to supply and enlarge her booth in the market.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru:
В центре с.В.Знаменка расположен магазин автозапчастей  Галины. Бизнес она ведет вместе с мужем, уже много лет.  Галина и ее муж очень открытые, общительные люди. Их хорошо знают  и уважают в районе, так как они сотрудничают с руководителями других сел, поставляют им запчасти на сельхозтехнику. За  время  работы приобрели большой опыт, поэтому знают какой товар завезти, чтобы покупатели могли приобрести у них все , что им нужно.
В последнее время Галина стала замечать, что запчасти на с/х технику стали покупать меньше, а на легковые авто спрос возрос. Поэтому чтобы не терять клиентов решили увеличить количество запчастей на легковые авто, для этого нужен кредит 21,000 гривен. Поученный кредит существенно поможет Галине в развитии ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Galina has a autoparts store in downtown V. Znamenka. She and her husband have been running the business together for many years. They are very open, sociable people. They are respected and well know throughout the region, since they provide agricultural equipment parts to drivers from other towns. With their extensive experience, they know what part to send, so that the buyers will have everything they need. Recently Galina noticed that fewer agricultural parts were being bought, and car parts were in higher demand. In order to not lose customers, they decided to expand their inventory of car parts, using a loan of 21,000 hryvnia. The loan will really help Galina develop her business.

loans.use: to increase inventory of spare parts

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación y tiene 2 hijos, ella continua con el negocio de venta de cosméticos en forma independiente. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cosméticos al por mayor como lápiz labiales, perfumes y esmaltes para uñas. 

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS” y agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Esther, 40, is married and has two children with her husband. She continues to be an independent cosmetics salesperson. She has applied for a loan to buy wholesale cosmetics like lipstick, perfume, and nail polish. She belongs to Liderando Las Palmeras communal bank and thanks those who share her dream through this group. She promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale cosmetics like lipstick, perfume, and nail polish.

loans.name: Maria Fernanda

texts.es:
Maria es una joven de 19 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus padres y hermanos, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Maria se encuentra estudiando la carrera técnica de Enfermería.
Por iniciativa propia, Maria trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Maria se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada cubrirá sus gastos de estudios, como pago de matricula, compra de utensilios y materiales de estudios, así pues Maria seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Maria is a 19 year old single young woman.  She lives with her parents and siblings in the city of Ica, within the Santiago district.  She is very hardworking, enthusiastic, and has a great desire to succeed.  Thanks to her efforts and her parent’s support, Maria is a nursing student.

She works as a field hand in the city two days a week for about 8 hours a day.  She believes that things are going well for her because of her efforts and dedication.

Maria is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to them she can pay her educational expenses, such as tuition, supplies, and study materials.  Maria will continue working to achieve her dream of becoming a good professional.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Vicenta de 40 años de edad, es una señora que no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, en la actualidad es madre soltera de 8 hijos, solo el primer hijo y el que tiene cinco años es barón las demás son hembras, todos viven con ella en la casa y solo cuatro hijos estudian en nivel básico.


Vicenta tiene ocho años de dedicarse al negocio de compra de leche la procesa y vende los quesos trabajo que lo realiza todos los días y dos veces al día, porque compra en la mañana y por la tarde. De ahí saca la crema,  la cuajada y el requesón,  la mayor parte la vende en la capital del país; por lo que tiene que viajar unos cien Kilómetros la ida son doscientos kilómetros por todo, cuando sale a vender, son las niñas que tienen que procesar la leche, quienes con dificultades lo hacen porque no tienen la fuerza suficiente, pero como no tienen otra fuente de ingreso es difícil dejar de trabajar un día.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a fundación campo, es  para comprar recipientes para la producción de la cuajada  y sobre todo equipar de lo más necesario a sus hijos en cuanto a los dormitorios, comprar camas y ropa de dormir.
La señora dice, que lo que más sueña es ver a sus hijos grandes y que se acuerden que ella ha luchado,  por qué no les haga falta la comida, tal vez no estudiados pero si personas de bien y que en el futuro posean una casa digna para vivir .
texts.en:
Vicenta is 40 years old, she is a single mother who did not have the chance to go to school. She has 8 children: the eldest and the one aged 5 are males, the others are females. They all live with her and only four of them go to primary school.

Vicenta has been engaged in buy milk for eight years, processing it to then selling cheese. She does so twice a day every day, as she buys milk in the mornings as well as in the evenings. She obtains cream, curd and cottage cheese, and she sells most of them in the state capital, thus having to travel for around a hundred kilometers. When she is out selling her products it’s the girls who have to process milk, and they do it with much effort as they are not yet strong enough; she has to have them do it because it would be hard if the activity stopped for a day, as this is their only source of income.

The loan she is requesting to Fundación Campo will be used to buy bowls to produce curd, and moreover to buy beds and bed clothing to furnish her children’s bedrooms.

She say that what she wants the most is to see her children grow up, and for them to remember she has striven so that food would never lack from their table; it does not matter to her that they study, but she wants them to be good people and for them to have a decent house to live in in the future.

loans.use: To buy bowls to produce curd,bed clothing and beds for her children’s bedrooms.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: Claudia, a sus 25 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos de 8 y 3 años y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental. Hace aproximadamente 4 años aprendió a realizar peinados para niñas, manicure y pedicure, pues vio en estas actividades una buena fuente de ingresos, razón por la cual se dedicó a estudiar en una academia de belleza para ampliar sus conocimientos y mejorar sus habilidades y técnica y, gracias a ello comenzó a prestar el servicio a domicilio para generar los recursos económicos que le permitan aportar a la economía de su hogar.  Adicionalmente desea incursionar en el negocio de la venta de mercancía como jeans, blusas, camisas, entre otros y así complementar la entrada de dinero con el que sustenta las necesidades de su familia. Esta es la razón por la que solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (blusas, camisas, jeans, accesorios, entre otros) e insumos de trabajo (esmaltes, limas, accesorios para decoración, laca para el cabello, elásticos, cintas de decoración para los peinados, entre otros), esto le ayudará a fortalecer ambos negocios y podrá mejorar sus ventas en la temporada de navidad, en la que la demanda de sus servicios aumenta, dando como resultado un mejor margen de rentabilidad. Claudia es consciente que para sacar adelante sus negocios, debe trabajar con empeño y mucha dedicación, sólo de esta manera podrá cumplir su objetivo principal de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y ofrecer a sus hijos la oportunidad de tener una excelente educación para que se forjen un futuro próspero y lleno de éxitos.
texts.en: Claudia, at 25, is the mother of two children ages eight and three and lives with her common-law partner.  Approximately four years ago she learned to do hairstyles for girls, manicure and pedicure; because she saw that these activities were a good source of income, reason why she studied at the beauty academy to expand her knowledge and improve her skills and technique and, thanks to this she started to provide services at her residence to generate economic resources that allowed her to provide to the economy of her home.  In addition, she wants to start selling merchandise such as jeans, blouses, shirts and others and this way complement the source of money to cover her family's needs.  This is why she requests support through a loan with which she wants to buy merchandise at wholesale prices (tops, shirts, jeans, accessories an other items) as well as materials for work (nail polish, nail filers, accessories, hair spray, hair elastic bands, hair decorating items and other); this will help her strengthen both businesses ans she will be able to improve her sales during the Christmas season, when demand for her services increases, resulting in a better profitability margin. Claudia knows that to get her business ahead, she has to work hard and with much dedication, only this way she will be able to achieve her objective to improve the life conditions of her family and offer her children the opportunity to have an excellent education to have a prosperous future full of successes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale prices (tops, shirts, jeans, accessories an other items) as well as materials for work (nail polish, nail filers, accessories, hair spray, hair elastic bands, hair decorating items and other items.)

loans.name: María Nelis

texts.es:
María de 40 años de edad, solo estudio sexto grado, es casada, tiene 5 hijos; el primero de ellos tiene 23 años y está acompañado, el segundo estudia segundo año de bachillerato, el tercero esta en USA y tiene 3 años de estar allá, la cuarta hija estudia 4° grado y la última estudia tercer grado, con ella solo viven 4 de sus 5 hijos.

La señora tiene una pequeña pupuseria, desde hace 6 años. Antes de tener su negocio, ayudaba a una amiga y por falta de recursos económicos decidieron detener el negocio, fue así como ella decidió retomar la actividad; pero ya de manera propia, antes de ello solo se dedicaba a los oficios domésticos. El negocio lo tiene en su casa por lo tanto no recorre ninguna distancia y en el solo se involucran sus 2 hijas. Generalmente venden por las tardes.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 20 libras de quesillo, 10 libras de chicharrón, tres rollos de polipel, un quintal de maíz, 5 fardos de sodas, tres cajas de jugos.

Pretende ampliar la producción de pupusas y que con la llegada de turistas a la zona, espera sea más rentable su negocio, para con las ganancias continuar construyendo una fosa séptica, que inicio en la época lluviosa  y debido a la saturación en el terreno de agua  se le derrumbo.
texts.en:
María, 40, studied up to the sixth grade. She is married with five children. Her oldest son is 23 and in a relationship, her second oldest son is in his second year of high school, her third oldest son has been in the U.S. for three years, her fourth oldest daughter is in the fourth grade, and her youngest daughter is in the third grade. Four of her five children live with her.

María has had a small tortilla-making business for six years. Before she had this business, she helped a friend. Due to a lack of financial resources, they decided to close their business. She decided to take up this activity again independently. Before, she was dedicated to the household duties. Her business is located in her home, so she does not have to travel. Her two daughters support her with her business. They usually open for sale in the afternoons.

She has applied for a loan to buy 20 pounds of soft cheese, 10 pounds of pork rind, three rolls of plastic, one quintal of corn, five cases of soda, and three boxes of juice.

She plans to expand her tortilla production. With the arrival of tourists to the area, she hopes that her business will be more profitable so that she can continue to build a septic tank with her earnings. She started construction during the rainy season, but it was destroyed due to water saturation.

loans.use: to buy 20 pounds of soft cheese, 10 pounds of pork rind, three rolls of plastic, one quintal of corn, five cases of soda, and three boxes of juice.

loans.name: Vitaliy

texts.ru: Виталий очень веселый, общительный  человек. На жизнь он смотрит с оптимизмом и заряжает этим окружающих людей. Виталий очень энергичный, ведет два бизнеса:  перевозит грузы  на своей машине, второй бизнес —  выращивание овощей. В семье Виталия  в этом году  были радостные события,  дочь вышла замуж и  у нее родился ребенок.  В связи с дополнительными расходами    для развития  сельскохозяйственного бизнеса Виталию  понадобились дополнительные средства.  Он не раз брал кредиты и они  очень помогают Виталию в развитии  его бизнеса.  Виталий просит кредит  20,000 гривен и на полученные средства  планирует построить склад для овощей, отремонтировать теплицу, закупить семена и удобрения. Виталий очень благодарен за помощь.
texts.en: Vitaly is a very cheerful, sociable person. He looks at life with optimism, and imbues the people around him with it. Vitaly is very energetic, and runs two busineses: transporting materials in his vehicle, and secondly, growing vegetables. Vitaly's family had several exciting events this year: his daughter got married and had a baby. Vitaly needs additional capital to meet his developing farming businesses additional expenses. He has obtained loans in the past, and they helped a lot with development of his business. He is asking for 20,000 hryvnia which he plans to use to build a storage area for vegetables,  repair his greenhouse, and buy seeds and fertilizer. Vitaly is very grateful for the help.

loans.use: to build storage for vegetables and fix his green house

loans.name: Mariza

texts.es:
Mariza tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y fruta de esta hermosa relación tiene 2 hijos, ella continua con la venta de comida y sigue con el restaurant, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m. de lunes a viernes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras, arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

Ella agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Mariza, 46, is married and has two children as the fruit of this beautiful relationship. She continues to sell food in her restaurant. She works from 9:00am to 6:00pm from Monday to Friday. She has applied for a loan to buy ingredients such as vegetables, rice, sugar, noodles, and other items.

She belongs to the "Liderando Las Palmeras" communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is grateful to those who make up part of her dream through this loan. She is committed to paying her installments at the established times.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as vegetables, rice, sugar, noodles, and other items.

loans.name: Adela Albina

texts.es: La  señora Adela tiene 55 años, ella se dedica  a la venta de comida desde hace mucho tiempo, vende  en su puesto de venta que se encuentra  que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Chasquipampa,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Adela va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de comida como: papa y abarrotes al por mayor,  la señora Adela enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que por la zona  hay muchas pensiones que se dedican a la venta de comida ya que es una zona comercila, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos para preparar sus riquísimos platillos,  se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Adela, age 55, has been selling food for a long time.  She sells at a sales stand at her own house in the Chasquipampa area.

This loan is her first cycle in the institution.  Adlea will use the loan to buy supplies like potatoes and groceries wholesale in order to make food.  The challenge Adela faces in her business is the competition.  In the area there are a lot of boarding houses that sell food because it is a commercial area.

She will use the profits in order to continue buying supplies to make her delicious dishes.  She is happy and grateful for this opportunity, which is being provided to her.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make food.

loans.name: Sandra Areli

texts.es:
Sandra de 23 años de edad, tiene 6° como nivel de educación, se quedó con ese grado de educación porque tuvo que trabajar debido a la separación de sus padres, es así que tenía 12 años cuando empezó a trabajar con su mamá a comprar leche a los vecinos y hoy a esta fecha sigue luchando, compra 250 botellas de leche diarias, también ella hoy es madre soltera tiene una niña de tres años. 

La señora tiene unos 12 años de tener este negocio, de venta de quesos procesados por ella misma, producto que tiene que viajar hasta la capital del país a venderlo;  lo cual viaja cada dos días, viaja ella y otra persona en bus  por lo que el viaje es de  todo el día, cuando ella sale busca a otra persona que le cuaje la leche, su mamá también es muy experta en elaborar este producto que fue quien le enseño.
 
La señora con el préstamo solicitado a fundación campo, es para comprar las puertas de la casa; ya que no son seguras están bien deterioradas, son cuatro puertas las construirá de balcón para considerar una duración mayor y más seguridad, por lo que estará satisfaciendo la necesidad de tener su casa un poco más segura.

El  sueño de ella y su familia es tener su casa más segura, mejorar en el futuro el baño, la pila donde recolecta el agua para el oficio y que dé a unos tres años ya haberle enseñado a una persona para que se dedique a vender y ella quedarse solo en el área de proceso de la leche, para  ya no andar vendiendo, sueña con ser una empresaria.
texts.en:
Sandra is 23 years old, and she has studied up to 6th grade because she has to go to work following the separation of her parents. She was 12 when she started working with her mother who bought milk from their neighbors, and to today she is still striving. She buys 250 bottle of milk every day, and she is also a single mother of a 3-year-old girl.

She has been engaged in this activity for 12 years, selling cheese that she herself processes. She has to travel up to the state capital to sell her product, and she does so ever two days. She travels by bus with another person, as the journey takes all day. When she has to go out selling she asks another person to curdle the milk; her mother is also expert in processing this product, as it was her who taught Sandra.

The loan she is requesting to Fundación Campo will be used to buy doors for her house, as the old ones are not safe and are in a dilapidated state. She will buy 4 metal grilled doors, so that they will last longer and provide more safety, thus succeeding in living in a safer house.

Her family and herself dream of having a safer house, and in the future they want to improve the bathroom, notably the sink where they collect water; in the space of the next three years she hopes to have found someone to teach how to sell her product to, so that she will only take care of the milk processing part and stop going out to sell it. She also dreams of becoming an entrepreneur.

loans.use: To buy 4 doors for her house.

loans.name: Roxana Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Roxana de 39 años de edad, su nivel académico es de 7º grado; ya que que en la época que ella cursaba su educación básica su familia sufría una crisis económica muy fuerte; motivo por el cual le llevo a dedicarse a trabajar con una vecina que era comerciante. Se dedicaba a la venta de pescado y verduras, desde entonces ella se dedica a dicho negocio motivada por su hermana, su hija y sus ganancias económicas.

 Resultado de ello pudo sacar a su hija con sus estudios de bachillerato, ahora ella se encuentra trabajando en un almacén. La señora Roxana habita en una vivienda familiar, con su hermana, su hija y su nieto.

Roxana se de dedica al comercio de pescado fresco, verduras y lácteos ella tiene una experiencia de 23 años trabajando en el negocio, que aprendió cuando trabajaba con su vecina que se dedicaba al mismo negocio. Ella posee un puesto en el mercado, también distribuye sus productos con un vehículo por las colonias y cantones  y lo hace con ayuda de su hermana . 

El dinero otorgado en calidad de préstamo, sera utilizado para invertirlo en productos para el comercio; como  pescado, la verdura y los lácteos. De esta manera, la necesidad que se vera satisfecha es la de tener un negocio mas surtido, en cual por las mismas condiciones obtendrá mejores ganancias. 

Las metas que ella tiene son: comprar su propia casa, tener un negocio mas amplio que le permita generar empleo, comprar otro vehículo 4x4 y de esta manera tendrá cubierta otras zonas a las cuales se le dificulta llegar, por la condición de las carreteras.
texts.en:
Roxana, 39, finished 7th grade. While she was in elementary school, her family suffered a financial crisis, and she had to start working with a neighbor who sold seafood and vegetables. Since then, Roxana, encouraged by her sister, her daughter, and the income, has run the same type of business. She was able to pay for her daughter's high school education, and her daughter now works at a warehouse. Roxana lives in the family house with her sister, daughter, and grandson. 

Roxana sells fresh fish, vegetables, and milk products. She has 23 years of experience in this business, which she learned from her neighbor who ran the same type of business. Roxana has a stall at the market and also uses her vehicle to transport merchandise with her sister's help to other neighborhoods and districts. 

She will use the loan to buy merchandise such as seafood, vegetables, and milk products to stock her business and earn more income. She has the following goals: buy her own house; grow her business so that she can provide jobs; and buy another 4x4 vehicle so that she can drive to difficult-to-reach areas where roads are poor.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as seafood, vegetables, and milk products.

loans.name: Jose Heriberto

texts.es: José, tiene 38 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos y reside en el municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. anteriormente se dedicaba a trabajar en una maquila y hace 4 años decidió poner su propio taller de ebanistería donde fabrica todo tipo de muebles como mesas, sillas, ropero, camas, puertas, divisiones etc. Este taller lo tiene en su casa y trabaja en base a pedidos. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar madera para la fabricación de muebles y puertas que le han encargado. Su meta es tener grande su taller y solvente y poder ayudar a sus hijos con la educación.
texts.en:
José, 38, is married with three children. He lives in the municipality of Quimistán in Santa Bárbara. He used to work in a manufacturing plant, but four years ago he decided to open his own woodworking shop. He builds all kinds of furniture, such as tables, chairs, wardrobes, beds, doors, dividers, etc. The workshop is located in his home and he works on the basis of orders.

He has applied for a loan of 15,000 Honduran lempiras to buy wood to make furniture and doors for the orders he has received. His goal is to have a larger, profitable workshop and to be able to help his children with their education.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture and doors.

loans.name: Noe Amael

texts.es: Noé, tiene 69 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos, reside en el municipio de Petoa, Santa Bárbara. Don Noé lleva 15 años de tener su propio negocio de pulpería, donde vende productos de la canasta básica como carnes, embutidos, productos de limpieza, refrescos, churros, azúcar y otros  y calzado escolar. La pulpería la administra junto con su esposa y también tiene un taller de zapatería, elabora zapato escolar para vender. Ha solicitado varios prestamos para sus actividades de negocio, actualmente solicita 10,000 Lempiras para comprar productos alimenticios y surtir la pulpería como ser: arroz, azúcar, manteca, sal, café, refrescos, lácteos, carnes, productos de limpieza etc. para surtir el negocio. Su objetivo es mantener su negocio y su familia y vivir bien económicamente.
texts.en:
Noé, 69, is married, has four children, and lives in Petoa, Santa Bárbara. For 15 years, Noé has had his own grocery store, where his sells basic items like meats, canned goods, cleaning supplies, sodas, churros, sugar, and school shoes. He runs the store with his wife, and he also has a shoe shop, where he makes school shoes to sell. 

He has applied for a number of loans for his business and is now requesting 10,000 to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, margarine, salt, coffee, sodas, milk products, meat, and cleaning supplies for his store. His goal is to keep his business going, support his family, and keep his finances in good order.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, margarine, salt, coffee, sodas, milk products, meat, and cleaning supplies for his store.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru:
Людмила уже достаточно долго занимается выращиванием томатов. Она очень веселый, общительный, трудолюбивый человек.  На своем участке построили несколько больших теплиц, трудились всей семьей. Однако за  последние два  года Людмиле пришлось много пережить. В семье случилась трагедия — сына сбила машина насмерть. Еще не утихла боль в сердце матери, дочь родила ребенка и заболела  тяжелой болезнью. Лечили 1,5 года и только сейчас она выздоровела. 

Среди всех этих переживаний Людмила не оставляет свое любимое дело. В этом году в теплицах Людмила посадила новый сорт розовых томатов и урожай был очень хороший. Однако цена на них была гораздо ниже, так как для перевозки на дальние расстояние они не годятся.  

Несколько раз Людмила  обращалась за кредитом  и это очень помогло в развитии бизнеса. В данный момент Людмиле нужен кредит 12,000 гривен для покупки семян, пленки и удобрений. Людмила говорит: « Спасибо, что вы есть. Я очень благодарна за оказанную помощь.»
texts.en: Ludmila has already ben growing tomatoes for a fairly long time. She is a very cheerful, sociable, and hard working person. She and her family built several large greenhouses on her property. However, the past two years have been very difficult for her. There was a family tragedy - her son was hit by a car and killed. His mother's heart still aches for him. Her daughter gave birth, and came down with a serious illness. It took one and a half years for her to recover. Through all of this, Ludmila did not stop her much loved work. This year she planted a new variety of tomato in the greenhouses and the harvest was very good. The price they brought was very low though, because they are not good for long distance transport. Ludmila has requested loans several times, and it as really helped her develop the business. Currently she needs a 12,000 hryvnia loan to buy seeds, plastic sheeting, and fertilizer. Ludmila says "Thank you for existing. I am very grateful for the assistance provided."

loans.use: to buy seeds, plastic greenhouse sheeting, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Señora Maria sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de sombreros para mujeres de pollera, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mercadería,  ya que surtió su tienda gracias a los créditos de Kiva , en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería sombreros por mayor  y así seguir mejorando su negocio y por ende sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria continues in the same business of selling hats for indigenous women. She said that she did very well with her previous loan since she was able to buy merchandise. Maria has been able to restock her shop thanks to the Kiva loans.

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan in order to buy hats in bulk quantity. This will improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy hats by the dozen.

loans.name: Lina María

texts.es: Lina es una mujer luchadora y con una energía positiva que le ha permitido lograr los objetivos que se propone. Es casada y madre de un hijo de 10 años de edad. Durante los últimos años obtuvo experiencia laboral, trabajando en un restaurante en el que le pagaban sólo dos mil pesos por cada hora de trabajo pero, esto no era suficiente para aportar a la economía familiar; por ello decidió retirarse de su empleo y hace 4 meses tomó la iniciativa de montar su propio negocio; una almacén en el que ofrece accesorios, productos de papelería,  helados y presta el servicio de fotocopiadora; de esta manera ha logrado generar los recursos económicos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo a solventar las necesidades de su familia. Su empuje, perseverancia y con el ánimo de salir adelante la motivaron a solicitar el apoyo de su primer ciclo de crédito con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (aretas, anillos, collares, pulseras, cuadernos, lapiceros, marcadores, pinturas, helados salsas dulces, galletas, barquillos, entre otros), con esto podrá tener bien surtido su negocio y estará en la capacidad de satisfacer los diversos gustos y requerimientos de su clientela, aumentando así el nivel de ventas y los ingresos que recibe por su labor. Lina manifiesta que con este apoyo que recibe podrá cumplir el sueño de ser independiente y al mismo tiempo podrá lograr una estabilidad económica favorable para  fortalecer aún más su negocio y hacer de él una gran fuente de ingresos, que le permita dar a su hijo un mejor futuro y educación y disfrutar en compañía de los que ama, una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lina is a fighter with positive energy that allows her to realize the goals she proposes. She is married and the mother of a 10 year old child. During the last years she has had work experience, working in a restaurant which paid her only 2000 COP per hour. This wasn't sufficient to support her family's finances so she decided to quit her job. Four months ago she decided to open her own business. It is a store which offers accessories, paper products, ice-cream, and photocopy services. So she has managed to generate the economic resources necessary to help her husband to pay the family's expenses.

Her drive, perseverance and the spirit to get ahead motivated her to request her first loan with which she wants to buy stock wholesale (earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets, notebooks, pencils, markers, paints, ice-cream, sweet sauces, biscuits, wafers, etc.). With this she can have her business well-stocked and satisfy the varied tastes and needs of her clientele, raising the level of her sales and increasing her revenues that she receives for her labor.

Lina says that with the help of this loan she can realize her dream of being independent. At the same time reach an economic stability to further strengthen her business and make it a strong source of income. So she can give her son a better future and education and share with those she loves a nigher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy stock wholesale (earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets, notebooks, pencils, markers, paints, ice-cream, sweet sauces, biscuits, wafers, etc.

loans.name: Sixta

texts.es:
Sixta vive en la ciudad de Imperial, cada día se levanta muy temprano para acudir a su centro de labores, ya que ella es obrera en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, con lo cual es su único ingreso para poder solventar los gastos de su familia ya que es madre de 2 pequeños de 12 y 7 años.

Sixta esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda, y de esta manera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda de material noble y poder darle una profesión a su familia”.
texts.en:
Sixta lives in the city of Imperial. She gets up early every day to get to her place of work. She is a worker on a farm in the city. This is her only source of income to support the household expenses as she is the mother of two children 7 and 12 years old.

Sixta is pleased with the lenders from Kiva as thanks to their support she can buy construction materials to make improvements on her home. In this way she can improve the quality of life for her family. She will continue to struggle to realize her great dream which is to build her house with solid materials and to be able to educate her children to be professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La señora Dominga de 35 años de edad,  se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado de  su casa. Ella se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, desde que tenia 15 años de edad ; oficio que aprendió de su madre con la cual se creció y aprendió todo sobre dicha actividad.

Ella vive con su familia formada por sus 5 hijos y su esposo, que se dedica a la carpintería y a la agricultura ademas hace viajes ya que cuentan con vehículo propio. 

La principal fuente de ingresos de Dominga, son las remesas de parte de un hermano que viven los Estados Unidos y su esposo se dedica a la carpintería.

El dinero sera utilizado, para reparar partes de la dirección del vehículo que poseen; ya que es el cual utilizan para transportar los muebles que fabrican y para hacer viajes. 

Para un futuro planea hacer mejoras en la vivienda, para dar una mejor protección a su familia y tener un taller de carpintería mas equipado para prestar un mejor servicio de calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Dominga, 35, is a housekeeper and also takes care of her own home. She has done housework since she was 15. She learned everything about this trade from her mother. She lives with her family, which comprises her five children and her husband. Her husband is a carpenter and farmer. He also make trips, as he has his own vehicle.

Dominga's income is based on money sent by her brother, who lives in the United States, and her husband's earnings as a carpenter. She will use this loan to repair their vehicle, which they use to move furniture that they make and to make trips. They hope to one day make improvements to their house so that the family is safer and to better equip their carpentry shop so that they can offer better customer service.

loans.use: to repair their vehicle.

loans.name: El Eden Group

texts.es:
El grupo El Eden está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, todas ellas participan activamente en las actividades propuestas por el grupo, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que tienen dentro del  grupo.  
Una persona a destacar es la Sra. Aida, quien es una persona muy luchadora, se dedica al humilde trabajo de criar y vender gallinas, y por medio de su trabajo y su esfuerzo está ayudando a su familia, tratando de darles todo y que no les falte nada.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus gallinas, y de esa forma poder seguir con la crianza de estas.
texts.en:
The group "El Eden" is in its second loan cycle with the Women's Committee Program. All of the members actively participate in events proposed by the group. They help one another to achieve common goals that they have established together as a group.

One person who is worth noting is Sra. Aida. She is a determined individual who engages in the modest job of raising and selling chickens. Through her work and her efforts, Aida is able to help her family. She tries to provide them with everything so that they don't feel deprived.

Aida is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her chickens. This will allow her to continue raising these animals.

loans.use: to buy balanced poultry feed.

loans.name: Ula

texts.en:
Ula is a 40-year-old married woman with 7 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, ta'amu, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Ula has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a wheel barrow. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Ula hopes to improve her house and save more for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a wheel barrow

loans.name: Tusiata

texts.en: Tusiata is a 59 year old single woman with 8 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tusiata has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, axe and a filing. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Tusiata hopes to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, axe and a filing

loans.name: Siauta

texts.en: Siauta is a 52 year old single woman with 2 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Siauta has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, filings, bush knives, chemicals and filings. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Siauta hopes to improve her house and business.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer, filings, bush knives, chemicals and filings

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Como toda mujer luchadora y comprometida con su familia, Julia a sus 50 años de edad trabaja muy duro en la agricultura junto a su esposo con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus hijos. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia cuente con mejores condiciones habitacionales puesto que su vivienda es muy humilde construida a base de lámina la cual es su principal patrimonio. Por lo anterior desea reparar la cubierta del techo de su vivienda ya que con el tiempo y las lluvias se ha deteriorado y es necesario que se repare. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos y así dar inicio a la reparación del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Like all women who are fighters and who are dedicated to their families, Julia, who is 50 years old, works hard as a farmer together with her husband in order to improve her living conditions and the lives of her children. For her the most important thing is that her family have better living conditions as their home, which is their primary asset, is very humble and is constructed from sheet metal. For this reason she wants to repair the roof of her home, as they have deteriorated with the rains and the passing of time and are in need of repairs. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to purchase galvanized sheet metal, lumber, and nails in order to begin repairs to the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: purchase galvanized sheet metal, lumber, and nails so she can begin to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Doña María tiene 40 años de edad es casada, ama de casa y agricultora desde muy temprana edad ya que fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar. Con su esposo procreo 5 hijos los 2 menores estudian en la escuela en diferentes grados de educación y los 3 mayores ayudan en las diferentes actividades que a diario se realizan en el campo para que sus cultivos de café, maíz y frijol se mantengan sanos y limpios de plagas entre otros que son causa del deterioro del producto. Doña María tiene un grado de estudio cursado hasta el 4 grado de primaria que por muchas dificultades en su familia siendo una de ellas la principal la falta de apoyo económico no pudo seguir estudiando y culminar la primaria. Por más de 12 años junto a su esposo han luchado en el desarrollo y crecimiento de sus cultivos ya que la agricultura (siembra de maíz, frijol y café) al final de cada cosecha son el alimento, para su familia, y la causa principal de la economía cubriendo gastos como vestimenta, medicina con muchas restricciones y el apoyo en sus estudios para sus hijos menores. El terreno que ella, su esposo y sus hijos asisten es propio mismo que fue comprado y está ubicado a 10 minutos de su casa de habitación al cual con facilidad se trasladan caminando. 
Sus metas y esperanzas es que por medio de este financiamiento ella pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para poder asistir sus cultivos ya que de esa forma ella generara ingresos para re invertir y podrá seguir fortaleciendo el patrimonio para sus hijos para que el día de mañana ellos tengan una tierra donde trabajar, forjar sus cimientos y alimentar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña María, 40 years old and married, has been a homemaker and grower from a very early age, seeing as it was her parents who taught her to work. With her husband, she has had 5 children, the two youngest of whom are school in different grades.  The three eldest help out with the various daily tasks that come up in the fields to make sure that their coffee, corn, and bean crops stay healthy and free from disease and other problems that can diminish output. María was in school through the 4th grade due to the many obstacles, primarily financial, that kept her from being able to go on studying and finish grade school.     

For more than 12 years, she and her husband have fought to develop and increase production of their crops, because at the end of every harvest these crops (plantings of corn, beans, and coffee) account for her family's food and make up the principal source of income, covering costs such as clothing, medicine, and her younger children's education costs. The land that she, her husband, and her children work is their own, and is located 10 minutes from her house, which she can get to and from easily on foot.  

Her goals and hopes are that, through this financing, she will be able to buy the supplies necessary for attending to her crops, which are her means of generating income that she can reinvest and use to go on building up her children's inheritance so that some day they will have land where they can work, build up a life for themselves, and feed their children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to support her cultivation of staple crops

loans.name: Guillermina Margarita

texts.es:
Guillermina tiene  53 años y es madre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho y por quienes se esfuerza cada día en su labor como agricultora ya que con ello puede tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Guillermina esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes, semillas, entre otros para poder mejorar su cultivo y sembrar nuevos productos, de esta manera tendrá una buena cosecha y seguirá esforzándose por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Guillermina, 53, has 2 children.  She loves her children very much and works at her farming business day in and day out to make a better life for them.

Guillermina asked us to thank Kiva lenders for their help and says that she will be able to use this loan to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds and other supplies for planting new crops and improving her yields.  The investment will help her to bring in a better harvest and support her ultimate goal: "I want both of my children to find paid work".

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 43 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Dora, es una mujer emprendedora quien trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y llevar sustento diario. Ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas gaseosas y tostadas de plátano. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella ya que es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora. Actualmente no cuenta con el servicio de luz eléctrica y uno de sus vecinos le comparte una pequeña extensión para que pueda tener energía por lo menos en la sala. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el pago del derecho de la energía eléctrica y la instalación de la red interna de la misma. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso pero si tiene la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Dora is 43 years old. She lives in a house on her own property together with her life companion and her children. She is an enterprising woman who works very hard to get her family ahead and earn the daily bread. She sells soft drinks and banana chips. Many people speak well of her as she is hard-working, enterprising and responsible.

At present she does not have electric lights and one of her neighbors shares a small extension with her so that she has power in the living room. Dora is requesting a loan from FUSAI to connect to the electrical grid and install wiring in her house. She hopes to be able to count on this loan as she doesn't have sufficient capital to pay by herself but she does have the capacity to pay her monthly installments.

loans.use: to pay to join the grid and install the interior electrical wiring.

loans.name: Jaime Rolando

texts.es: Jaime de 20 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su hermana, madre y padre. Jaime es un joven que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajador y responsable. Desde muy joven su padre le enseño a trabajar la tierra y ahora es lo que le permite colaborar con la economía del hogar. Su deseo es mejorar las condiciones del baño ya que con el tiempo el techo se ha dañado y desea mejorarlo para mayor seguridad. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina de fibrocemento, hierro, pines, cemento, etc.  Expresa tener la capacidad de pago de las cuotas mensuales que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Jaime is 20 years old. He lives in his own house with his family which consists of his mother, father and sister. Jaime is a youth who is hard-working and responsible. From a young age his father taught him to work the land and this now allows him to contribute to the household finances.

His biggest desire is to fix the bathroom as with time the roof has deteriorated. He wants to improve it to be safer. This is the reason Jaime is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of fiber cement sheeting, re-bar, wood, cement etc. He has expressed his ability to pay the monthly installments as required by the loan.

loans.use: to buy fiber-cement sheeting, re-bar, wood, cement to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en:
Temukisa is 51 years old and married, with one child. 

She runs a business selling "elei lavalava" (Samoan printed fabric wraparounds) in her community. She has five years of experience with this business. 

Temukisa has requested a loan to buy materials, design boards, paints, paint brushes, etc. 

She plans to use her profits to extend her business and to support her family. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, designs, paint, paint brushes,  etc

loans.name: Elsa Julia

texts.es:
Elsa vive en la ciudad de Nazca, para poder tener ingresos para poder sacar adelante a su familia tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de ceviche desde hace 1 año; gracias a este negocio ha ido mejorando su vivienda poco a poco, es por ello que trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo.

Elsa esta agradecida con el apoyo que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá comprar un triciclo para poder ofrecer su platillo por las calles de su ciudad ya que el que tiene esta en mal estado y  de esta manera poder tener mas ingresos; asi seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Elsa live in the city of Nazca.  She started her own food business a year ago, making and selling ceviche.  The business is her means of supporting her family and she tells us that it has provided her with the money she's needed to pay for improvements to her house.  

Elsa wants us to thank Kiva lenders and says that she will use this loan to buy a pedal trike to replace the old worn-out one that she has now.  She works as a street vendor and will use the pedal trike to carry her ceviche from place to place.  The investment will allow her to continue working toward her goal: "To rebuild my house with sturdier materials".

loans.use: to buy a pedal trike for her food business.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis vive en la ciudad de chincha y está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar materiales para poder mejorar su vivienda ya que se encuentra con muchas grietas y el techo esta en malas condiciones, lo cual le permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su madre y seguir trabajando para poder culminar su carrera de ingeniería y cumplir su sueño: “Darle una profesión su menor hija”.
texts.en: Luis lives in the city of Chincha.  He asked us to thank Kiva lenders for their support and says that he will use this loan to buy construction materials.  He needs the materials to repair the many gaps in the walls of his house and to replace the worn-out roof.  The investment will allow him to provide a better quality of life for him and his mother.  Luis is working toward an engineering career and says that his dream is: "To ensure my young daughter can study for a career of her own".

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Hugo Jeferson

texts.es: Hugo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su vivienda ya que actualmente no tiene un artefacto que le permita conservar mejor sus alimentos, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida y seguir trabajando en su labor como operario de construcción para luchar por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Hugo asked us to thank Kiva lenders for their support and says that he will use this loan to buy a refrigerator.  He wants the refrigerator because he has no good way to store food now and the investment will improve his quality of life.  Hugo works as a construction equipment operator and his dream is: "To have a house of my own".

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Jose Ángel

texts.es: José de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad. José trabaja como agricultor desde hace tres años y de esta forma mantiene a su familia. José es un hombre responsable, trabajador y visionario. Siempre está pendiente de que su familia se encuentre bien y tenga las condiciones necesarias. Su vivienda es muy sencilla y las lluvias y el tiempo han dañado la cubierta del techo por lo que desea repararlo lo antes posible. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina de fibrocemento y polines para hacer la reparación.
texts.en: José is 26 years old and lives together with his partner and their young, 2 year old son in their own home. José has worked as a farmer for three years and is able to provide for his family this way. He is responsible, hardworking, and ambitious. He is always trying to make sure that his family is doing well and that they have everything they need. His home is very simple, and the rains and passage of time have damaged his roof. For this reason he would like to repair it as soon as possible. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to purchase fiber cement siding and purlins in order to make the necessary repairs.

loans.use: purchase fiber cement siding and purlins in order to make repairs to his roof.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es: Misael de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Misael, es un hombre trabajador, emprendedor y responsable. Desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al negocio de venta de Tortas Mexicanas. Este negocio lo ha adecuado en su lugar de residencia y es su principal fuente de ingresos. Actualmente Misael no cuenta con el servicio propio de energía eléctrica ya que actualmente le ha estado pagando a un vecino para que le permita tener el servicio. Ha tomado la decisión de pagar el derecho e instalar la energía eléctrica para cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación y pago al derecho del servicio de luz eléctrica.
texts.en:
Misael is 29 years old and lives in his own house with his small 5 year old daughter. Misael is a hard-working, enterprising and responsible man. For a long time now he has been selling Mexican tortas (sandwiches). The business is located in his house and is his main source of income.

At present Misael does not have his own electrical connection and pays a neighbor who allows him to use his service. He has decided to pay the fees for electrical rights and install electricity in his house. So he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to pay for the installation and the right to connect to the grid.

loans.use: to pay for the installation and rights to connect to the grid.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: A sus 56 años de edad Teresa trabaja muy duro como empleada doméstica para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Teresa habita en casa propia  junto a su grupo familiar. Su vivienda es su principal patrimonio la cual desea hacer algunas mejoras ya que con el tiempo la cubierta del techo se ha deteriorado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra dañando sus pocas pertenencias. Solicita ese crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
At 56 years of age Teresa works very hard as a domestic employee to make the money to support her family. Teresa lives in her own home together with her family. Her house is her principal asset and she wants to make some improvements on it. With time the roof has deteriorated and when it rains water filters through damaging her few belongings.

Teresa is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of her dwelling as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy laminated sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Carolina Emperatriz

texts.es: Carolina de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 meses. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y junto a su esposo mantienen su hogar. Actualmente las tuberías del agua potable se han estropeado por lo que no puede tener acceso al agua potable. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tubos, pega, codos, cemento, arena, etc. Además, desea repellar las paredes del baño que actualmente construyó. Espera poder tener acceso a este financiamiento ya que no puede hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si tiene la capacidad para pagar las cuotas del crédito.
texts.en: Carolina is 23 years old and she lives in her own home together with her partner and their young, 5 month old son. She works as a housekeeper and together she and her husband look after their home. Currently the drinking water pipes are not working, so they do not have access to potable water. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to purchase pipes, glue, joints, cement, and sand, etc. Also, she hopes to repair the walls of the bathroom she recently built. She hopes to have access to these funds as she cannot pay for the entire project herself, but she is able to make the regular payments on the loan.

loans.use: purchase pipes, glue, joints, cement, sand, etc. Also, she hopes to repair the walls in the bathroom she recently built.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 22 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su esposo y trabaja como empleada de una tienda cercana a su localidad. Su casa es muy pequeña y no hay suficiente espacio para guardar su pocas pertenecías y habitar en la misma.  Por lo anterior desea invertir en la ampliación de un cuarto para mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales. Solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena, hierro y grava, y así poder ampliar el cuarto lo antes posible. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Sandra is 22 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband. She works as an employee in a store close to her residence. Her house is quite small and there is no room to put their few possessions and live comfortably.

So she has decided to invest in making a room larger to improve their living conditions. She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing cement, bricks, sand, re-bar and gravel to enlargen the room as soon as possible. She has expressed the ability to pay the installments of the loan as required.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, re-bar and gravel to make a room of her house larger.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to plaster the walls and cement in the floors of their house.

loans.name: Vaimoana

texts.en: Vaimoana is 50 years old and married with eight children. She runs a small business selling ice cakes in her community. She has been doing this for two years. Vaimoana has requested a loan to buy a freezer, food cover, plastic cups, cordials, bags of sugar, etc., for her business. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Vaimoana will expand her business and improve her house.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, bags of sugar, cordials, plastic cups, food cover, etc., for her business

loans.name: Bella Samaria

texts.es:
Bella es una joven luchadora y emprendedora con una edad de 25 años, casada y madre de 2 hijos. Ella tiene un grado de estudio primaria incompleto cursado hasta el 3 grado ya que no pudo continuar estudiando par la falta de apoyo económico de sus padres quienes son de escasos recursos. Ella es una joven con muchos deseos de superarse es modista y en compañía de su esposo el cual es supervisor de planta en una maquila tiene una pequeña micro industria de trasformación de tela con la que fabrican camisas, ropa para bebe, pantalones, buzos, chalecos, bóxer, etc. para todas las edades. Ella tiene más de 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad pero como micro empresaria 4 años ya que la idea empezó con una amiga que le facilito dos máquinas para elaboración de ropa y le pidió que le elaborara ropa para bebe para la venta. Con los meses ella vio la demanda que recibía sobre la calidad de su producto y decidió emprender su propia micro empresa dando gracias a Dios por los resultados obtenidos ya que hoy en día no solo tiene 2 máquinas sino un pequeña variedad con la que fabrica mercadería para vender en el mercado local siendo estos estudiantes, tiendas, colegios, escuelas y público en general. 
Sus sueños hacer de su micro industria una gran industria competitiva a nivel nacional e internacional con la cual pueda dar a conocer la calidad, durabilidad y costura con la que su producto es fabricado. Como madre de familia apoyar a sus hijos, dar a ellos la oportunidad que ella en su juventud no tubo y que hoy en día la preparación universitaria es un requisito más para la integración en la sociedad, obtener buenos trabajos, nuevos conocimiento y nuevos métodos para hacer crecer los negocios y demás para que estos sean competitivos.        
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de materia prima (tela, caja de hilo variado, agujas, etc.) para la fabricación de mercadería para la temporada navideña la cual espera sea un éxito.
texts.en:
Bella is an entrepreneurial and determined young woman. She is 25, married, and the mother of 2 children. She completed school through the 3rd grade because she couldn't go on studying due to lack of financial support from her parents, who had scant resources. She is a young woman with many hopes of making something of herself. She is a clothes maker and, along with her husband who is a plant manager at a factory, she has a small micro-business using fabric to produce shirts, baby clothes, pants, overalls, vests, boxers, etc for all ages.    

She has been making clothes for more than 5 years, but has only been in business as a micro-business owner for 4 years. The idea started with a friend who helped her get 2 machines to make clothes and suggested that she make baby clothes for sale. Over the course of months, she saw the demand she was generating with the quality of her products and decided to launch her own business. She gives thanks to God for the results she has seen so far, seeing as today she doesn't just have 2 machines, but a whole variety with which she makes merchandise for sale at the local market to students, other stores, schools, and the general public.  

Her dream is to make her micro-business into a major business that is competitive at the national and international level, that is known for the quality, durability, and technique with which her products are made. As a mother, she also dreams of supporting her children and giving them the opportunity she never had to get an education, as today a university education is a requirement for social acceptance, getting a good job, gaining new knowledge and learning methods for growing a business, and in order to be competitive.   

This is why today she is taking out this loan to buy primary materials (fabric, variety thread set, needles, etc) for making merchandise in advance of the Christmas season, which she hopes will be a success.

loans.use: to buy primary materials for making seasonal clothing

loans.name: Surgir 22 Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento SURGIR 22, está compuesto por nueve integrantes seis mujeres y tres varones,  todas ellas se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Pétrona, tiene 35 años, ella se dedica  al servicio de llamadas en su punto de llamadas que se encuentra ubicado en la zona 16 de Julio,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Pétrona va a usar este préstamo para la compra de cabinas telefónicas para agrandar su punto de llamadas, la señora Pétrona enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que existen varios puntos de llamadas por la zona, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando cabinas, teléfonos tarjetas telefónicas, etc.  se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: The SURGIR 22 lenders' bank is made up of nine members, six of them women and three men, all of whom are involved in a variety of businesses. The president of the bank is Mrs. Pétrona. She is 35 years old and provides phone services at her call center located in the 16 de Julio neighborhood. This loan will be her first with this lending institution and Mrs. Pétrona will use it to buy phone booths to grow her call center. Mrs. Pétrona faces challenges, namely competition from the other call centers located in the area. She will use this loan and her income to go on buying phone booths, phone cards, etc. She is happy and thankful for the opportunity that has been provided to her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy phone booths

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El señor Antonio es una persona responsable y trabajadora, vive en concubinato desde hace varios años atrás y tiene 2 hijos a los cuales mantiene y ayuda en su educación. Se dedica a la agricultura en su pequeña parcela en la que tiene plantaciones de cítricos y yuca y después comercializa sus productos en la población de Ivirgarzama, pese a todo su trabajo los ingresos que obtiene no le alcanzan para subsistir, por tal motivo solicita un crédito para ampliar su plantación de cítricos y así poder incrementar sus ventas para mejoras las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Sr. Antonio is a responsible, hard-working man.  He and his wife have been together for several years and they have 2 children, both of whom are in school.  Antonio is a farmer.  He has a small plot of land where he grows yucca and citrus fruits.  He sells what he harvests in the town of Ivirgarzama.  Despite his hard work, his earnings don't stretch far enough to live and, consequently, he is applying for a loan that he will use to expand his citrus fruit crop.  The investment will increase his earnings and generate the money he needs to support his family.

loans.use: To expand his citrus farming business.

loans.name: Luís Alonso

texts.es:
Luis  de 47 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura en pequeño, su actividad es la siembra de granos básicos Maíz, Frijol y Maicillo, ademas cuenta con un micro bus con el cual trabaja haciendo viajes a personas que lo solicitan, el señor Luis cuenta con principios y valores morales lo que lo ha lleva hacer una persona muy reconocida en el lugar que reside.

Él vive con su familia, la cual esta formada por su esposa y sus 3 hijos, de los cuales dos de ellos se encuentran cursando sus estudios de educación básica en el centro escolar de la comunidad y su hija mayor se encuentra estudiando en una, universidad de la ciudad, mientas que su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar.

 Tiene una experiencia de 32 años en el trabajo de la agricultura, manifiesta que lo aprendió de su padre ya que en aquella apoca esa era la principal fuente de ingresos de su familia, cuando el cumplió 23 años viajo a Estados Unidos y estuvo trabajando durante 4 años, luego regreso y adquirió el micro bus con el cual aun se encuentra trabajando. 

El crédito otorgado sera utilizado, para comprar una vaca de clase,  ya que manifiesta que tiene mucho espacio libre y uno de sus metas es comenzar a cuidar ganado y de esa forma ir aumentando los ingresos económicos a su familia. 

Los sueños y metas que el señor Luis tiene para su futuro son, tener un corral con ganado de clase y y producir lácteos, ademas comprar otro micro bus para transportar a mas personas y todo esto lo podrá hacer posible con el apoyo de créditos adquiridos con Fundación Campo.
texts.en:
Luis, age 47, farms on a small scale.  He grows basic grains; corn, beans, and sorghum.  He also has a micro bus, which he works with making trips that people request.  Luis has principles and moral values that have made him a very well-known person in the area where he lives.

He lives with his family, which is comprised of his wife and their three children.  Two of the children go to elementary school at the community school center.  His oldest daughter attends the city university.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores.

He has 32 years of experience working in agriculture.  He says that he learned this from his father because during that time, this was his family’s main source of income.  When he turned 23, he traveled to the United States.  He worked there for four years.  He then returned and got the micro bus, which is still working.

The loan that was granted will be used to buy a cow from good stock.  He says that he has a lot of free space.  One of his goals is to start raising livestock.  This way he will be increasing the income for his family.

Luis’s dreams and goals for the future are to have a farmyard of good quality cattle and to produce dairy products.  He also wants to buy another micro bus to transport more people.  All of this will be made possible with the support of the loans from Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy a cow from good stock.

loans.name: Carla Patricia

texts.es: Carla de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de  dos años. Carla se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Junto a su compañero de vida llevan el sustento a su hogar y han logrado comenzar una pequeña casa la cual no han logrado terminar por falta de capital.  Desea que su casa se termine lo antes posible razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento, lámina y grava para terminar de construir la casa lo antes posible.
texts.en: Carla is 25 years old and lives together with her partner and their young, 2 year old son in their own home. Carla has worked as a housekeeper for many years. Together with her partner, they provide for the household and have begun to build a small home, which they have not been able to finish due to lack of financing. They hope to finish their new home as soon as possible, which is why they have requested this loan through FUSAI in order to purchase brick, sand, cement, metal sheeting, and gravel in order to finish construction quickly.

loans.use: purchase brick, sand, cement, sheeting, and gravel to complete construction on her home.

loans.name: Tavai

texts.en: Tavai is 49 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling pork buns in her community. She has been doing this for many years. Tavai has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, frying pans, yeast, black pepper, etc., for her business. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Tavai will expand her business and support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, frying pans, yeast, black pepper, etc., for her business

loans.name: Noe Arnulfo

texts.es:
Noé de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, ya que en la escuela donde el estudio solamente había hasta séptimo grado, y para seguir sus estudios le tocaba desplazarse al lugar más lejos, y él no tenía la facilidad para seguir estudiando y tampoco no tenía dinero, para cubrir sus gastos de estudio,  su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar 2 hijos que tienen uno de ellos va a primer grado.

Tiene 4 años de experiencia, de trabajar en un taller, que se les dio a todos los jóvenes en la comunidad, ahí fue como el aprendo este trabajo, gracias a esto el así es como se gana su vida y también la de su familia, él trabaja en proyectos.  Para ir a su trabajo camina 30 minutos a pie y trabaja de 6 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para la construcción de su vivienda; ya que él ahorita esta viviendo en una casa que le ha prestado su suegra,  él necesita tener su casa propia , que le permita tener un mejor estilo de vida, para su familia.
Los sueños de Noé, es tener una vivienda digna que  le permita tener un estilo de vida mejor, que le de protección, seguridad y así que le permita tener a su familia cómoda y que se sienta satisfecha de tener un casa  propia.
texts.en:
Noé is 22 years old and studied through the 7th grade, which was the highest grade in the school where he went. In order to continue his studies he would have had to relocate to a place far way and he didn't have the ability to stay in school. Nor did he have the money to cover his education costs. His wife is a homemaker and cares for their 2 children, one of whom is in first grade.  

He has 4 years of experience apprenticed in a workshop, an opportunity that is given to all the youths in his community. That's how he learned to his trade as a contractor, thanks to which he makes a living and provides for his family. To get to work, he walks 30 minutes and works from 6:00 in the morning to 3:00 in the afternoon. 

The loan he is taking is for the construction of his house, as he is currently living in a house borrowed from his mother-in-law. He needs his own house in order to have a higher quality of life for his family. Noé's dreams are to have a decent home that will afford him a better life, provide protection and security, and allow him to make his family comfortable, and to feel the satisfaction of having his own home.

loans.use: to build his house

loans.name: Selesa

texts.en: Selesa is a 25-year-old married woman with one child. She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tavai has requested a loan to buy  chemicals, bush knives, fertilizers, filings, chemicals and spades . She has been a member of Kiva partner SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Tavai hopes to improve her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, bush knives, fertilizers, filing, chemicals and spades.

loans.name: Edgar Naveli

texts.es:
Edgar de 42 años de edad, estudio hasta 3 grado; ya que por motivos de escasos recursos económicos de la época, a  él se le hiso difícil seguir con sus estudios y se dedicó al trabajo en la agricultura,  luego aprendió a manejar; ya que trabajaba de camionero con un amigo de él y le enseño a manejar y a comprar un pick up y se dedicó al trabajo de transportista.  Así es como él ahora se gana la vida, la esposa de él trabaja en una mini tienda que ella tiene, ellos no tienen hijos porque hace un año que se acompañaron.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para arreglar su carro con el cual  trabaja, ya que él lo reforzara le pondrá más hojas de resorte en la parte trasera,  para que cuando lo cargue no se le agache, el costo de esto anda por $200 dólares, también  le comprara las 4 llantas.
$600 dólares. 
Sus sueños es andar el carro en buenas condiciones, que le permitan brindarles un mejor servicio a sus pasajeros cada día. Él con los ingresos que va obteniendo a futuro, para comprar una camioneta para ofrecerles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Edgar is 42 and was in school up to the 3rd grade, when the scant resources he had at the time made it difficult for him to stay in school and he went to work in agriculture. Later on her learned to drive, as he was working with a friend who taught him to drive and how to buy his own pick-up, and he began to work as a hauler and driver. That's how he makes his living now. His wife works in a small store that she has and they don't have any children because they've only been married a year. 

The loan he is taking out is to fix up his car, in which he works. He plans to reinforce it by adding some more leaf springs to the rear of the car so that when he loads, nothing bends. This will cost $200 and he will also buy 4 tires for $600. His dream is to travel the road in better condition so that he can offer better service to his passengers on a daily basis. With the income he makes in the future he hopes to buy a better truck to offer better service to his customers.

loans.use: to reinforce the truck he works in by adding some more leaf springs to the rear for $200 and to buy 4 tires for $600.

loans.name: Ruth Esperanza

texts.es: Ruth de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus 4 hijos de  20 años, 17 años, 13 años y 8 años de edad. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa cercana a su localidad y juntos llevan el sustento a sus hijos. Ruth se dedica a la venta de hojas de huerta (hoja utilizada para elaborar Tamales), la venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad y tiene 7 años de dedicarse a este negocio. Desea mejorar la cubierta del techo de la vivienda ya que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y desea repararlo lo antes posible. Además, desea encementar el piso de uno de los cuartos de su vivienda el cual es de tierra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos, cemento, arena y grava para reparar la cubierta del techo y encementar el piso del cuarto.
texts.en:
40-year-old Ruth lives in her own home with her family, which is formed of her husband and her four children who are 20, 17, 13, and 8 years old. Her husband works at a company close by and together they support their children. Ruth works selling banana leaves (which are used to make tamales), and she does this in the street throughout different areas of her town. She has been doing this for seven years. 

Ruth hopes to improve the roof of her home because it has deteriorated over time, and she wants to repair it as soon as possible.
