Ruth also wants to pour a concrete floor for one of the rooms in her home which is dirt. For these reasons, she is requesting a loan from FUSIA to invest in the purchase of metal sheets, wood, nails, cement, sand, and gravel in order to repair her roof and to make the floor concrete.

loans.use: buy metal sheets, wood, nails, cement, sand, and gravel in order to report her roof and make the floor concrete.

loans.name: Jose Ignacio

texts.es: José es un joven  de 22 años de edad que habita junto a su abuela y primo y se dedica a la agricultura. Cada año cultiva maíz, frijoles y maicillo y luego lleva parte de la cosecha a los principales mercados de su localidad para ponerla a la venta. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Sus condiciones habitacionales son muy sencillas pero su vivienda es propia que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir. Desea construir un cuarto de habitación para poder mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de adobe, madera, teja y pago de mano de obra ya que no tiene el capital para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si tiene la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
José is 22 year old young man who lives with his grandmother and cousin and works in farming.  Each he grows year corn, beans and sorghum he takes part of the crop to sell in the the main markets in the area.  This way he is able to earn a living and support his home.  His living conditions are very simple but his house is his own, as with much will-power he managed to build it.

He wishes to build a room in the house to improve his housing conditions.  For all this he is requesting this loan from FUSAI invest in purchasing adobe bricks, wood, and tile as well as pay for the manpower, as he does not have the capital to take care of the costs on his own, but he is able to make the payments on the loan.

loans.use: to buy adobe bricks, wood, and tile as well as pay for manpower to build a room in a house.

loans.name: Sonia Vanessa

texts.es:
Sonia de  años de edad, estudio hasta 7° grado, ella por motivos de emigración no siguió con sus estudios y se dedicó al comercio de artículos, juguetes y ropa para niños.  Ella se acompañó, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tiene 3 hijos; 2 van a la escuela.

Ella tiene 5 años de dedicarse al comercio, ya que por el poco estudio que tuvo, no logro encontrar un trabajo formal, cuando estaba pequeña salía a vender ropa con su mamá; ella se dio cuenta que también de esto podía ganarse la vida justamente, y así lo hizo dedicandose a este trabajo. Sonia  tiene un puesto de venta en el centro del municipio, trabaja de 7 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde de lunes a domingo. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar más mercadería(juguetes y ropa para niños), ya que en esta época es cuando hay una demanda fuerte del producto que vende, por eso necesita comprar suficiente mercadería y suplir la demanda de sus clientes.
 
A futuro planea tener un negocio fuerte del producto, así como sus ingresos; ya que ella su sueño es darles el estudio a sus hijos hasta que sean profesionales, y puedan tener un mejor estilo de vida, diferente al de ella.
texts.en:
Sonia attended school until 7th grade.  For emigration reasons, she did not continue with her studies and worked selling toys and clothing for children.  She is married and her husband works as a farmer.  They have three children, two of whom attend school.

She has worked as a merchant for five years since she was not able to find a job due to the small amount of education she has.  When she was young, she went out to sell clothing with her mother, and realized that she could also earn a living that way, so she started doing that type of work.  Sonia has a stand in the center of town.  She works from 7:00am until 1:00pm from Monday to Sunday.

She is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise (toys and children's clothing), since this is the time when there is a strong demand for the products she sells.  It is necessary to have enough merchandise and meet the demands of her customers.

In the future, she plans to have a business with strong products and a strong income.  Her dream is to give her children an education so that they can be professionals and have a better style of life, different than the one she has.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise (toys and children's clothing).

loans.name: Cintia

texts.es:
Cintia es una joven de 22 años de edad madre soltera de 2 hijos quienes estudian en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación en la escuela de la comunidad, ama de casa y agricultora por vocación familiar. Tiene un grado de estudio de primaria completo gracias al apoyo financiero y moral por parte de sus padres mismos que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad enseñándole los procesos que lleva el café para su utilidad al final de cada temporada. Con 6 años de experiencia ella lucha en compañía de sus padres para sacar a sus hijos adelante ya que por situaciones en la vida ella se separó del padre de sus hijos y sus padres la acogieron en su hogar y le heredaron un pedazo de tierra cultivado y productor de café para que ella pudiera generar ingresos para el bienestar de sus hijos el cual está ubicado a media hora de camino desde la casa de habitación de sus padres. 
Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos en un mejor futuro, con mejores oportunidades, mejores condiciones de vida para que puedan ser apoyo en sus familia y personas preparadas académicamente. Por lo que ella hoy en día solicita financiamiento con el cual mejorara sus cultivos dando una mejor asistencia aplicando insumos agrícolas como abono, fertilizantes, formula cafetalera, fungicidas y limpieza de maleza que evitaran la contaminación de bichos y enfermedades en la plantación de café.
texts.en:
Cintia is a 22-year-old single mother of two children that are in elementary school, in different grades of the school in her community, she is a homemaker and farmer through family tradition.  She studied elementary school thanks to the financial and moral support from her parents who also showed her how to work the land and at a very early age taught her the coffee process and its use at the end of each season.  With six years of experience behind her, she works together with her parents to get her children ahead, because due to a situation that presented in her life she separated from the father of her children and her parents took her in at their home and gave her a piece of land that was planted and producing coffee so that she could generate income for the well-being of her children.  It is located half an hour from her parents' house.
She dreams to see her children have a better future, better opportunities, better life conditions so that they can support their own family and be prepared academically.  This is why today she requests financing to improve her crops, giving them better maintenance by applying agricultural products such as organic fertilizer, other fertilizer, coffee related formulas, fungicides and weed cleaners that will prevent insects and diseases in her coffee plantation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products to maintain her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru: Людмилу очень любят  в селе. Она очень отзывчивый, добрый человек. Людмила занимаются выращиванием редиса и помидор. Этим бизнесом занимается уже более 20 лет, имеет опыт, построили за это время несколько теплиц. В этом году Людмиле сделали операцию, поэтому справляться с хозяйство хорошо помогает муж и  сын. На днях семья ожидает прибавление в семействе. Жена сына 7 месяцев ее беременности лежала в больнице и теперь уже подошел срок родов. Много средств ушло на  поддержание здоровья, поэтому понадобились дополнительные средства для поддержания семейного бизнеса. Людмила просит предоставить ей кредит 12,000 гривен на приобретение семян и  пленки для теплиц.
texts.en:
Ludmila is very well loved in her village.  She's a really good, kind-hearted person.  She earns her living growing radishes and tomatoes.  She's been in business for twenty years and has experience.  During that time she built a number of greenhouses.  This year had an operation, so her husband and son are helping really well to manage the farm.  

The family anticipate a new addition in the next few days.  When Ludmila's son's wife was seven months pregnant she was in the hospital but now she's at term.  Many measures were taken to maintain her health, so additional measures were needed to maintain the family business.  Ludmila is seeking this loan of 12,000UAH to purchase seeds and some plastic for the greenhouse.

loans.use: to purchase quality seeds and replace plastic for a greenhouse.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es: Blanca de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos de 19 años, 17 años y 12 años de edad. Junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar y trabajan por sacar adelante a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y hojas de huerta (hoja utilizada para elaborar tamales), la venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad. Desea invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso para instalarlo en un cuarto de su vivienda ya que en la actualidad es de cemento y se está deteriorando. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso, cemento, y arena, y así comenzar la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
43-year-old Blanca lives in her own home with her husband and her children who are 19, 17, and 12 years old. She and her husband both carry the economy of the household and are working to get their children ahead. 

Blanca works selling new clothes and banana leaves, which are used to make tamales. She sells her wares in the streets throughout the different areas of her community. She wishes to invest in the purchase of brick flooring to install in a room of her home, because the floor is currently cement, and it is deteriorating. 

For these reasons, Blanca is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of brick flooring, cement, and sand, so that she can begin the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: purchase brick flooring, cement, and sand.

loans.name: Senda De Vida Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento SENDA DE VIDA, está compuesto por nueve integrantes seis mujeres y tres varones,  todas ellas se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Felipa, tiene 44 años y dos hijos de 8 y 12 años, ella se dedica  a la venta de comida ella vende chicharrón de cerdo desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a esta actividad, vende  en su puesto de venta que se encuentra  que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Satélite,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Felipa va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración del pescado como chuño, papa y maíz al por mayor,  la señora Felipa la va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos para preparar sus riquísimos platillos,  se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es la única actividad a la que se dedica ya que es un negocio familiar.
texts.en:
The communal bank Senda de Vida is made up of nine members, 6 women and 3 men. All of them work in different activities.

The president of the bank if Felipa. She is 44 years old, and has 2 children who are 8 and 12 years old. She works in food sales. She sells pork rinds and has been doing this for a long time. She has a food stall which is located at her residence which is in the area of Satélite. 

This is her first sequence with the institution. Felipa is going to use this loan to buy supplies for making dishes including fish, freeze-dried potatoes, potatoes, and corn in bulk. Felipa is going to use the profits to continue buying supplies to prepare her delicious dishes.

She feels happy and grateful for this opportunity that is offered to her as this is the only activity she dedicates herself to as it is a family business.

loans.use: to buy food supplies to be used in her chicharron  stall

loans.name: Eunice De La Cruz

texts.es: La señora Eunice habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, a sus 34 años trabaja duro para poder ver terminado su mayor sueño, madre de una niña pequeña, ella trabaja para una empresa privada y su esposo es Electricista trabaja por cuenta propia, el crédito lo solicita para realizar una de las últimas etapas de su vivienda, un anexo en la parte trasera de la cocina para tener un poco más de espacio en la vivienda, comprara: Laminas de Zinc, cubetas de Pintura, laminas de Playcem. Agradece la confianza que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado ya que gracias a estos créditos su familia a salido adelante
texts.en:
Eunice lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. She is 34 years old and works hard in order to see her dream completed. She is the mother of a little girl. She works for a private business and her husband is a self-employed electrician. 

The loan she is requesting is to finish the last stage of her housing, an annex in the back of the kitchen in order to have a little more living space. She will buy:  corrugated zinc, paint buckets, and Playcem sheets. She is grateful for the trust that Kiva and Afodenic have offered her as thanks to these loans her family is getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es:
Flor de 32 años de edad, es casada, estudio hasta noveno grado. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposo e hijos a quienes enviá a la escuela,  mientras ella se dedica actividades comerciales y su esposo se dedica a la albañilería  para llevarle el sustento a ellos. 

 Flor  se dedica al comercio de Frutas de temporada(mango, jocotes,aguacate, etc.) oficio que aprendió de su madre, las cuales compra en los alrededores de su residencia y luego va a vender al mercado y además se dedica a vender leche, ya que tiene varias vacas que le producen.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos vacas, que le venden para producir más leche y elaborar queso.

Flor planea en un futuro, comprar un terreno para tener sus animales, ya que actualmente alquila.
texts.en:
Flor is 32, married and studied up to 9th grade.  She gets up at 5:00 a.m. as well as her husband and children who she sends to school, while she works in commercial activities and her husband does construction work to support them.

Flor works selling seasonal fruits (mango,  avocado, etc) activity that she learned from her mother, she buys the fruit in locations around her residence to then sell them at the market, she also sells milk, as she has several dairy cows.

The loan requested to Fundacion Campo is to purchase two cows, that will be sold to her to produce milk and make cheese.

Flor plans to, in the future, buy a piece of land to have her animals there, she currently leases the land.

loans.use: to purchase two cows.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en: Mona is a 21-year-old single woman with one child. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Mona has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a wheel barrow. She has been a member of SBPD since November 2013. With her profits, Mona hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a wheel barrow

loans.name: Angelica

texts.en:
Angelica has requested a $600 loan to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as diesel gasoline. Angelica has been involved in business activities since 2004. She feels very comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Angelica independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. Angelica hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy additional supplies such as diesel gasoline.

loans.name: Tavaae

texts.en:
Tavae is 33 years old and married, with five children. 

She has a small plantation where she grows taro, taamu, manioka, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Tavae has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and a wheel barrow. She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. 

With her profits, Tavae hopes to improve her house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and a wheel barrow

loans.name: Epe

texts.en: Epe is a 25-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Epe has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, iron roofings and timber. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Epe hopes to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, iron roofings and timber

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is 41 years old and married, with five children. 

She has a small plantation where she grows taro, taamu, and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

May has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a wheel barrow, spades, axes, a chainsaw, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2009. 

With her profits, May would like to renovate her house and support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheel barrow, spades, axes, a chainsaw, etc

loans.name: Julia Martina

texts.es: Doña Julia es una mejer trabajadora, madre soltera, ella sueña con algún día terminar su casa y darle mejores condiciones de vida a su hija, quien la apoya económicamente en todo, la señora Julia labora como domestica en una casa privada desde hace mas de 5 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra: zinc, cemento, arena, además pagara la mano de obra. Ya que con mucho esfuerzo ella realiza los crédito para poder comprar lo necesario ya que muchas veces se le hace difícil comprar por su cuenta los materiales, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Kiva le han brindado.
texts.en:
Julia is a hardworking woman, a single mother, and her dream is to someday finish her home and provide better living conditions for her daughter whom she supports financially. Julia has been working as a housekeeper in a private home for more than 5 years. 

The loan that she is asking for is to buy: zinc, cement, sand, and some to pay the laborers. It is through a lot of effort that she is taking a loan in order to buy what is needed as many times it is difficult to buy the supplies on her own. She thanks Afodenic and Kiva for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: José de 42 años de edad es un hombre trabajador dedicado a su familia. Reside en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijas dos gemelas de 15 años y una de 19 años de edad. José se gana la vida como empleado de una institución cercana a su localidad. Con los ingresos que percibe lleva el sustento a su hogar. Sus condiciones habitacionales son muy sencillas y desea mejorarlas ya que para él la familia lo es todo. Actualmente no posee con el servicio de energía eléctrica y el piso de su casa es de tierra por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava, el cableado y la instalación de la energía eléctrica y así dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 42, is a working man dedicated to his family.  He lives in his own home with his life partner and three daughters - two 15 year-old twins and one 19 year-old daughter.

José earns his living working in an institution close by.  With the income he receives, he provides for his family.  His living conditions are very simple and he wants to improve them since for him, family is everything.  Currently he does not have electricity and the floor of his house is dirt.  Therefore he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, gravel, wiring, and to pay for installing electricity in order to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, gravel, wiring, and to pay for installing electricity in his house.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
Martha Lidia es una joven de 24 años de edad es madre soltera de 2 hijos el mayor en el kínder y el menor de 3 años de edad, vive en compañía de sus padres, abuelos y sus hermanos. Tiene un grado de educación secundaria incompleta cursado hasta el 2 año de ciclo común básico y gracias a FUDEIMFA brazo técnico de la cooperativa COMIXMUL aprendió corte y confección. Ella es comerciante ya que se dedica a la venta de café actividad que aprendió de sus padres a muy temprana edad y lo realiza desde hace 5 años teniendo como entradas de efectivo extra los trabajos que realiza mediante la costura y reparaciones de camisas y pantalones siendo sus clientes sus amigos, vecinos, y demás. También ella se dedica a la elaboración de tamales, charamuscas ya que por medio de esta pequeña actividad ella también genera más ingresos para su familia e hijos los cuales son su prioridad. La tierra que ella trabaja es propia una herencia por parte de sus padres la cual está ubicada a una distancia de 6 kilómetros de su casa de habitación a la cual se traslada caminando o en bicicleta en los cuales se involucra su hermano.
Su sueño es ser la mejor y mayor productora de café de la zona, poder expandir su tierra por medio de la compra y sembrar una mejor variedad la cual pueda ser más competitiva en el mercado como el caturra, Borbone, que son atractivos para sus clientes de esa forma podrá percibir mayores ingresos y apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios. Es por ello que el día de hoy ha solicitado a COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual planea comprar insumos agrícolas: 1 saco de urea, 1 saco de abono 12-24-12, 1 saco de fórmula 18-46-0, 2 sacos de nutrí café, 2 sacos de formula cafetalera con lo cual podrá dar un mejor y mayor mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Martha Elena is a young women who is 24 years old. She is a single mother of two children; the older is in kindergarten, and the younger is three years old. She lives with her parents, grandparents, and her brothers. Martha Elena has an incomplete secondary education, having only finished two years of the standard cycle, and thanks FUDEIMFA, the technical arm of the cooperative COMIXMUL, she learned sewing. 

She is a business woman who produces and sells coffee, a trade she learned from her parents at a very early age. She has been doing it for five years, meanwhile receiving income from the extra jobs she does sewing tailoring and repairing shirts and pants for her customers, friends, neighbors and others. 

She also works making tamales and caramel candies, which also generates more income for her family and children who are her priority. The land that she works is her inheritance from her parents, which is located six kilometers from her home, and she can reach walking or on a bicycle, accompanied by her brother.

Her dream is to be the area's best and biggest producer of coffee, by being able to expand her land by the purchase and planting of a better variety of coffee plants which can be more competitive in the market, such as caturra, or Bourbon, which are attractive to her clients. In this way, she will be able to generate more income and support her children in their studies. 

This is why today Martha Elena has requested financing from COMIXMUL with which she plans to buy agricultural supplies such as one sack of urea,  one sack of manure 12-24-12, one sack of formula 18-46-0, 2 sacks of nutrí cafe, and two sacks of coffee formula, which will allow her to give better and greater maintenance to her coffee crops.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies with which she will be able to support and maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Heriberto Antonio

texts.es:
Heriberto de 26 años de edad,  esta acompañado y estudio hasta bachillerato.  Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa e hijo quien va a la escuela y dependen de las actividades que realiza.

Él  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 2  Km y trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen; en  la noche se dedica a cuidar parcelas de otras personas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una yunta de bueyes, que necesita para arar la tierra donde cultiva y podrá obtener un ingreso adicional por arar otras parcelas, lo que le ayudara a mantener a su familia 

A futuro desea adquirir, un terreno para construir una vivienda para su familia, ya que actualmente vive  alquilando.
texts.en:
Heriberto is 26 years old, is accompanied, and studied through high school. He gets up at 5:00am. His wife and his son who goes to school are dependent upon him.

He works in the business of agriculture which he learned from his parents. He walks 2 kilometers to his fields and works in the morning and his wife does the domestic chores and cares for their cows. In the evening he works taking care of land for other people.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy a team of oxen that he needs in order to plow the land he farms and to be able to obtain additional income plowing other fields, which will help him support his family.

In the future he hope to buy land to build a house for his family as currently they are renting.

loans.use: to buy a team of oxen

loans.name: Marlyn Liseth

texts.es: Marlyn madre de dos niños pequeños uno de ellos en edad escolar, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a sus padres, su esposo trabaja por cuenta propia ya que es Técnico en Refrigeración, ella por su parte tiene una pulpería en su casa, el crédito lo solicita para incrementar un poco su inventario, con la compra de Abarrotes, Golosinas, Refrescos, Accesorios de uso personal, etc. así su negocio aumentara y con las ganancias obtenida lo utilizara para la compra de materiales y construir su casa, Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le están brindado con esta nueva oportunidad.
texts.en: Marilyn, the mother of two little children, one of them of school age, lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her parents. Her husband is self-employed, since he is a refrigeration technician. On her part, she has a little grocery store in her house. She is applying for the loan to increase her inventory a little with the purchase of groceries, candies, soft drinks, personal accessories, etc. Thus her business will grow, and she will use the earnings obtained to buy materials and construct their house. She is grateful for the support that Kiva and AFODENIC are offering her with this new opportunity.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock her store

loans.name: Noel Alberto

texts.es: El señor Noel habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe en la comarca llamada Las Conchitas, el tiene una pequeña Pulperia, quien con mucho esfuerzo a levantado desde hace 4 años, su esposa se dedica a Lavar y Planchar ajeno para obtener mas ganancias en su hogar, el credito lo solicita para incrementar su inventario comprara: Abarrotes, Carnes, Refrescos, Golosinas, etc. ademas aprovechara las fiestas de este mes para que su venta incremente y obtener mayores resultados, agradece la confianza que se ha brindado.
texts.en: Señor Noel lives in the town of Ticuantepe, in the district called Las Conchitas. He has a little grocery store, which he set up four years ago with great effort. His wife does washing and ironing for others to obtain more earnings for their household. He is applying for the loan to increase his inventory. He will buy groceries, meats, soft drinks, candies, etc. Furthermore, he will take advantage of the celebrations of this month so that his sales will grow and he will obtain better results. He is grateful for the confidence shown in him.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock his store

loans.name: Rubia De Jesus

texts.es: Rubia de 36 años de edad es madre soltera de dos niños de 17 años, 12 años y una niña de 14 años de edad.  Rubia, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad tales como verduras, frutas, cereales, etc. La ubicación del negocio la tiene en su lugar de residencia y gracias a su carisma y buenos productos que ofrece muchas personas la prefieren. Para ella lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Las paredes de su vivienda están hechas a base de adobe  las cuales necesitan que se repellen ya que con la lluvias se están deteriorando por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena para repellar las paredes de su vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rubia is 36 years old, a single mother of two boys who are 17 and 12 years old, and a daughter who is 14 years old.

Rubia sells basic commodities such as vegetables, fruit, grain, etc.  Her business is located within her home and thanks to her charisma and good products she offers, many people prefer buying from her.  For her, the most important things are her children, and she works very hard to provide for them.  

The walls of her home are made of adobe which need to be plastered since because of the rains they are deteriorating.  Because of this she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement and gravel to plaster the walls of her house and prove better safety for her children.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of her home.

loans.name: Silomiga

texts.en: Silomiga is a 42-year-old woman who is married with six children. She runs a business sewing clothes and selling them in her community. She has 13 years of experience with this business. Silomiga has requested a loan to buy fabrics, a sewing machine, oil and thread. She plans to use her profits to expand her business and to save for her children's education. She joined South Pacific Business Development in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, a sewing machine, oil, hangers and thread

loans.name: Togikoko

texts.en:
Togikoko is 43 years old and married, with two children. 

She owns and operates a business venture, sewing and selling clothes. She has five years of experience in this line of business.

Togikoko needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine, scissors, materials, oil, and thread.  She hopes to use her profits to pay her children's school fees and to support her family.

She joined SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, scissors, materials, oil, and thread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her education.

loans.name: Santos Agustín

texts.es:
Santos de 50 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor, ademas, de trabajar como agente de seguridad, tiene la iniciativa de comercializar productos medicinales naturales. En el estudio, logro sacar 8° grado, eso le ha servido para conseguir el trabajo que tiene. Esta acompañado y su señora  se dedica al negocio de artesanías y productos medicinales naturales. Los hijos ya formaron su propia familia, de él solo depende su señora.

Trabaja como agente de seguridad, un día trabaja y otro descansa, este día lo aprovecha para comercializar productos medicinales naturales, que los adquiere a un precio considerable de los proveedores, al venderlo le queda un margen de ganancia. Tiene un  año de experiencia en este negocio. Comercializa el producto en la comunidad y sus alrededores, de casa en casa y por pedidos. 

Tienen ademas el negocio de venta de artesanías de barro, pero este solo en esta época navideña es cuando realizan esta actividad.

Necesita el crédito para invertir en el negocio de elaboración y venta de artesanías de barro, aprovechando la época navideña, donde hay gran demanda de estos artículos.
Teniendo el financiamiento, podrá invertir y así tener ingresos adicionales para su familia, cubriendo las necesidades básicas y ademas  el negocio podrá ser  auto sostenible.

El cliente desea tener su casa propia, ya que donde viven es alquilado; esto lo planean realizar  fortaleciendo su iniciativa productiva. Así, generar ingresos  que le permitan  ir ahorrando y en un futuro cercano hacer realidad su sueño.
texts.en:
Santos, age 50, is an entrepreneurial man who, in addition to working as a security guard, has the energy to market natural medicinal products. As far as school is concerned, he managed to get through 8th grade, which has been enough to get him the job he has. He is married and his wife is busy with the artisanal crafts and natural medicines business. 

Their children have already started their own families and he is all his wife has to depend on. He works as a security guard, working every other day. On his off days, he makes use of the time to sell natural medicine products, which he buys at a considerable price from the distributors and sells at a profit. He has one year of experience in this business, making sales in the community and surrounding areas, door to door and by order.

They also have a business selling clay crafts, but this they only do during the Christmas season. He needs this loan in order to invest in his business making clay crafts to take advantage of the Christmas season when there is a major demand for these items. With financing, he'll be able to invest and make extra money for his family to cover basic necessities, as well as make his business self-sustaining. 

Santos wishes to have his own house, as he currently rents, and plans to do this by strengthening his productive capacity. This way, he will make the income he needs to go on saving and in the near future make his dream a reality.

loans.use: to invest in his clay crafts business

loans.name: Cecilia Ramona De Fatima

texts.es:
Cecilia tiene 56 años,. Pero tiene la vitalidad de una joven de 20 años. Para poder salir adelante y poder mantener su hogar Cecilia tiene su negocio de venta de yogurt natural, al cual le dedica alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien porque es muy amable con sus clientes

Cecilia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como envases al por mayor, insumos para la preparación del yogur, entre otros; lo que le permitirá seguir luchando por hacer realidad su sueño de Tener una gran empresa de yogur.
texts.en: Cecilia is 56 years old, but has the energy of a young woman of 20. To be able to get ahead in life and keep up her home, Cecilia runs a natural yogurt business, on which she spends about 9 hours every day. She believes that it's going well because she is very friendly with her customers. Cecilia is grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have offered her she will be able to buy materials like containers at wholesale, and ingredients for making yogurt, among other items. This will allow her to go on fighting to make her dream come true, which is having a major yogurt business.

loans.use: to buy materials like containers and ingredients for making natural yogurt

loans.name: Unidos Por Siempre Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento UNIDOS POR SIEMPRE está compuesto por ocho integrantes de los cuales seis  son mujeres y dos varones que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es  la señora Adriana tiene 34 años y es casada con tres hijos pequeños,  ella se dedica  a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad en su  tienda de barrio que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La paz,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Adriana va a usar este préstamo para a la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de surtir su tienda ya que se acerca la época de Navidad y desea comprar también panetones, la señora Adriana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona hay muchas tiendas de barrio, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando mercadería y así incrementar su capital y poder tener un almacén ya que este es uno deseos, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: The entrepreneurial bank "Unidos por Siempre" (United Forever) consists of eight members, of whom six are women and two are men. They work in different businesses. The president of the bank is Señora Adriana. She is 34 years old and is married, with three little children. She sells basic necessities in her neighborhood store, which is located in her home in the Tembladerani zone of the city of La Paz. This loan is her first one with this institution. Señora Adriana is going to use this loan to buy merchandise to stock her business. Her reason for applying for this loan is the need to stock her store, since the Christmas season is approaching and she wants to also buy Christmas cakes. Señora Adriana faces challenges in her business, namely, competition, since there are many neighborhood stores in her zone. She is going to use the earnings to continue buying merchandise and thus increase her capital and be able to have a grocery store, which is one of her desires. She feels happy and grateful for this opportunity which is offered to her.

loans.use: to buy Christmas cakes to stock her store

loans.name: Socorro Isabel

texts.es:
Socorro es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, con mucho esfuerzo y sobre  todo mucho ahorro logro comprar un local el cual alquila para eventos como matrimonios, cumpleaños, entre otros y de esta manera puede tener ingresos para poder mantener y sacar adelante a su familia.

Socorro está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un equipo de sonido para poder alquilarlo también y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener varios locales para alquilar”.
texts.en:
Socorro is a women who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead. With plenty of effort, and above all, a lot of savings, she managed to buy a space, which she rents out for events such as weddings and birthday parties among others, and in this way can have income to be able to maintain and get her family ahead. 

Socorro is very grateful to the loaners at Kiva, because thanks to the help they've offered, she will be able to buy a sound system that can also be rented.  This is how she will be able to improve her income and keep fighting to make real her great dream of having several places to rent.

loans.use: buy a sound system.

loans.name: Digna Emerita

texts.es:
Doña Digna es una señora de 46 años de edad, luchadora, emprendedora, ama de casa y agricultora, con muchos ánimos y deseos de salir adelante, madre soltera de 3 hijos los cuales estudian en primaria en diferentes grados de educación.  Doña Digna tiene un grado de estudio de primaria incompleta cursado hasta el cuarto grado ya que sus padres de escaso recursos no pudieron apoyarle para que ella pudiese culminar la primaria. Gracias al apoyo moral de sus padres ella pudo aprender las técnicas y procesos necesarios para el cultivo de café con una experiencia por más de 15 años ella sigue trabajando duro y constante para salir adelante con sus hijos ya que ella es madre soltera y no tiene más apoyo. El terreno que trabaja es propio y lo adquirió gracias a una herencia por sus padres el cual está ubicado a 30 minutos de distancia de su casa de habitación al cual se traslada caminando.
Sus metas y esperanzas para con su negocio es poder ampliarlo, generar mayores ganancias, comprar un nuevo terreno con plantilla nueva de café para que sus ingresos mejoren para el bienestar de sus familia y hogar. Como madre para sus hijos apoyarlos en sus estudios, darles la oportunidad de poder prepararse académicamente y que ellos no pasen por la misma situación que ella en su juventud por la falta de apoyo económico.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas y poder asistir sus cultivos de café previniendo el deterioro por los cambios climáticos, enfermedades como la roya y bichos como la broca.
texts.en:
Digna is 46 years old, a fighter, enterprising, head of the household, and a farmer with a lot of enthusiasm and the desire to succeed. She is a single mother with 3 children studying different grades in primary school.

Digna did not complete her fourth year of primary school education because her parents had limited resources and could not support her through the complete primary course of study. Thanks to the moral support of her parents she could learn the techniques and processes necessary for growing coffee and she has more than 15 years experience. She continues working hard and constantly in order to bring up her children as she is a single mother and has no other support.

The land that she works is her own and she acquired it thanks to an inheritance from her parents. It is located 30 minutes from her home which she traverses by walking. Her goals and hopes for her business is to expand, generate higher earnings, to buy new land with new coffee seedlings to improve her income for the wellbeing of her family and home. As a mother to her children she supports them in their studies, giving them the opportunity to be able to prepare academically so that they do not go through the same situation as she did as a youth due to the lack of financial support.

So today she is asking for financing in order to buy agricultural supplies and to be able to care for her coffee crops preventing deterioration from climatic changes, diseases such as rust and the coffee berry borer (beetle-like insect).

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies in order to tend to her coffee crops

loans.name: Agrefina

texts.en:
Agrefina is 34 years old, and she is now applying for a loan of USD 1.000 to improve her business.  She opened her kiosk in 2000 with her own working capital of USD 100.  She earns a good income from her business.

She will use her loan to buy more stocks to keep in her store, such as cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, noodles, oils, milk, and body lotion.

She is a very hard-working woman.  Doing business has become her regular activity for the past 13 years. 

She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, noodles, oils, milk, and body lotion

loans.name: Avei

texts.en:
Avei is 37 years old and is married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling cakes, pork buns, long donuts and mince pie in her community.  She has been doing this for 4 years. 

Avei has requested a loan to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, fryer, knives, baking powder, oil and a bag of onions. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings Avei will expand her business and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, fryer, knives, baking powder, oil and a bag of onions

loans.name: Lendi Dinora

texts.es: Lendi de 23 años de edad habita en condiciones sencillas y humildes junto a su compañero de vida y se dedica a la agricultura y a la pesca. Junto a su compañero de vida cultivan cereales como: maíz, frijol y maicillo y parte de la cosechan la ponen a la venta y la otra la dejan para el consumo. Su vivienda es su principal patrimonio por lo que desean mejorarla para que en un futuro pueda convertirse en la herencia de los hijos que planean tener. Actualmente la vivienda no posee corredor lo cual no es seguro ya que cuan llueve el agua azota mojando sus pocas pertenencias. Además, no cuenta con el servicio de la energía eléctrica. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de teja, hierro, red del cableado de energía eléctrica y pago de mano de obra y así poder iniciar la construcción del corredor e instalar la energía eléctrica lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Lendi is 23 years old and lives in simple and humble conditions with her life partner and works in farming and fishing.  Together with her life partner they grow grains such as corn, beans, and sorghum and part of the crop they put on sale while the other they keep for their own use.

Their home is their chief asset and due to that they want to improve it so that in the future they can change it into the inheritance for the children they plan on having.

Currently the home does not have an passageway which is safe since whenever it rains the water pounds through, getting their few possessions wet.  It also lacks electricity.  She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying tile, iron, wiring for electricity, as well as paying for manpower in order to be able to start building the passageway and installing electricity as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy tile, iron, wiring for electricity, as well as paying for manpower to build a passageway and install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es:
Ana es una joven de 26 años, la cual trabaja como asistente en un panadería de su ciudad, con lo cual tiene ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Ana esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una computadora con la cual podrá realizar sus trabajos de mejor manera y con una herramienta necesaria.
texts.en:
Ana is a 26-year-old young woman who works as an assistant in a bakery in her city. This is how she has income to be able to get ahead.

Ana is grateful to the lenders of Kiva because thanks to the help they've offered, she will be able to buy a computer, which will allow her to do better work with a necessary tool.

loans.use: purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Flores Del Campo Group

texts.es:
El señor Marvin Joel de estado civil casado. Cuenta con 37 años de edad. De escolaridad diversificado completo. Tiene 3 hijos y 2 de ellos estan estudiaando. Se dedica a la agricultura. Inició este negocio con poco capital y a la fecha lleva 15 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para comprar fertilizante y semillas para sus cosechas. Desea en el futuro contar con un mayor capital para poder tener mas cosechas y exportarlas.

Los demás intgrantes del grupo se dedicana a la agricultura y al comercio.
texts.en:
Marvin Joel is legally married, and he is 37 years old. His schooling is altogether varied and diversified.

He has three children, two of which are studying. He works in agriculture, and he started this business with little capital, but today has 15 years of experience. 

He is organizing a group and requesting a loan which he will use to buy fertilizer and seed for his crops. Marvin Joel wishes to have greater capital in the future to be able to have more crops and export them. 

The rest of the members of the groups work in agriculture and trade.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Jhenifer Angelica

texts.es:
Angelica es una jose de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo y cada día se esfuerza mucho en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y artículos de decoración para el hogar, ya que con los ingresos de su humilde negocio puede salir adelante y poder apoyar a su madre con algunos gastos.

Angélica está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando ella podrá comprar mercadería como ropa y algunos adornos navideños para su negocio y de esta manera poder atender a sus clientes para la campaña navideña, así ella seguirá luchando por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener un local propio”.
texts.en: Angélica is 19 years old and lives in the city of Chiclayo. Every day she works very hard in her small business, a stall from which she sells clothing and home decor items. She uses the income from her modest business to get ahead and support her mother with a  few expenses.  Angélica is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for the help they have provided her. She purchased clothing and a few Christmas decorations, which will enable her to tend to her clients during the Christmas season. She will continue working hard to realize her dream, which is, as she says, "to have a store of my own".

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Sui

texts.en:
Sui is 44 years old and is a married woman with 6 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 10 years. 

Sui has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, a spade, a rake, bush knives and a bag of fertilizer . She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Sui hopes to improve her plantation and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, a spade, a rake, bush knives and a bag of fertilizer

loans.name: Loline

texts.en:
Loline is 59 years old and is married with 8 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community. She has been doing this for 5 years.

Loline has requested a loan to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, baking soda, shopping bags and pots. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings Loline will save more for her children's education and support her family.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, baking soda, shopping bags and pots

loans.name: Ramona Irma

texts.es:
Ramona de 53 años de edad, por sus pocos recursos económicos, solo aprendió a leer y escribir en su casa, pues proviene de una familia muy numerosa y ella es una de las mayores y tenía que ayudar a trabajar en su casa, hoy en día su esposo es agricultor y ella le ayuda a trabajar en la tierra, de los seis hijos que tiene solo uno se encuentra con ellos pues todos ya están acompañados.

Ella aprendió a trabajar en la agricultura gracias a sus padres, hoy en día se le dificulta ya que está acostumbrada al trabajo, ella y su esposo tienen que recorrer 2 kilómetros para llegar a donde están los cultivos, salen a las 6 de la mañana, regresan al medio día a trabajar en su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para reparar un vehículo que les sirve para transportarse de su casa al centro de la ciudad, también le servirá para transportar la cosecha cuando necesita venderla.

En el futuro quiere que sus hijos y nietos no sufrieran lo que ella sufrió, pero gracias al préstamo otorgado les ayudara en el trabajo y también para salir a visitar a sus hijos, en un futuro piensa sembrar más para salir poco a poco de la pobreza.
texts.en:
Ramona is 53 years old.  Due to her family's scarce financial resources, she only learned to read and write at home.  She comes from a large family and was one of the oldest, so she had to help out at home.  Today her husband works in agriculture and she helps him work the land.  Of the six children she has, only one lives with her as the others are all in relationships.  

She learned to work in agriculture from her parents.  Today it is difficult for her although she is used to the work.  She and her husband have to travel 2 kilometers to the fields where their crops are.  They leave at 6 in the morning and return around midday to work in their home.  

The loan she is requesting will be used to repair a vehicle to use to travel from their home to the city center.  It will also be used to transport their crops when they need to be sold.  

In the future she wants her children and grandchildren not to suffer what she suffered. This loan will help with their work and also allow them to visit their children.  In the future she plans to plant more and bit by bit escape poverty.

loans.use: to repair a vehicle.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Elvira works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables. Elvira is borrowing 8,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients like vegetables, meat, seasonings, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

Elvira has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like vegetables, meat, seasonings, spices, etc. for her food vending business

loans.name: Judith Alcides

texts.es:
Judith, tiene 39 años de edad, divorciado, tiene dos hijos y vive solo en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa. Tiene muchos años de experiencia en agricultura en siembra de viveros, flores, cultivo de yuca y de café. La venta la hace en el mercado local por el cual le pagan muy bien, Con su duro trabajo quiere realizar su sueño de darle una mejor vida a su hijo menor.
Ha solicitado otro préstamo a ODEF, siendo el tercer ciclo y es por 5,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar insumos y fertilizantes para darle mantenimiento a los cultivos de yuca, flores y café, con el propósito de mejorar la producción y hacer crecer el negocio para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Judith is 39 years old, divorced, and has two children. He lives alone in the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa. He has many years of experience in agriculture, growing garden plants and flowers, and cultivating yuca and coffee. He sells his crops in the local market, which pays him very well. With his hard work he hopes to realize his dream of giving a better life to his younger son. He has taken out other loans with ODEF and this one, his third, is for 5,000 Limpares [HNL]. He will use this money to buy supplies like fertilizers to maintain his yuca, flowers, and coffee crops, with the aim of improving production and growing his business to make a higher income.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizers to maintain his yuca, flowers, and coffee crops

loans.name: Etelinda

texts.es:
Etelinda tiene una edad de 29 años con un grado de estudio de primaria incompleto cursado hasta el tercer grado que por la falta de apoyo económico por parte de sus padres no pudo completar sus estudios primarios, casada y junto a sus esposo se dedica a la caficultura y también al cultivo de patastes, naranjas, plátano y bananos con una familia muy numerosa compuesta por cuatro hijos una hembra y tres varones quienes estudian. Etelinda tiene mucha experiencia en dichas actividades ya que desde muy temprana edad ella se interesó en aprender y sus padres con mucha paciencia y esmero le enseñaron las técnicas adecuadas de plantación y la debida asistencia que estos requieren para que se mantengan sanos y limpios. Como desafió de un productor a lo único que ella le puede temer es que sus cultivos mediante una helada (factor clima), plagas, enfermedades pueda perder su cosecha ya que la competencia no es un problema pues para la venta de su producto ya tiene los clientes quienes la han apoyado desde hace muchos años. Sus cultivos están ubicados en la misma propiedad donde está construida su casa de habitación por lo que esto le permite una asistencia y un mantenimiento personalizado.
Sus planes en un futuro es poder cultivar una mejor variedad de café con la cual pueda ofrecer y competir en el mercado nacional e internacional. Su sueño para su negocio y su familia es obtener una mayor producción como lo dijo anteriormente y poder completar la educación de sus hijos hasta que ellos se puedan convertir en buenos profesionales con carreras universitarias que les permitan mejores oportunidades en la vida. Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que podrá asistir y dar mantenimiento a sus cultivos para obtener una buena cosecha y mejores ingreso para el apoyo de su familia y su hogar.
texts.en: Etelinda is 29 years old.  She completed all but one year of elementary school.  She attended school through the third grade but was not able to complete her primary school education because her parents did not have the financial resources.  She is married and along with her husband she grows coffee, as well as chayotes, oranges, plantains and bananas.  She has a large family made up of four children; a girl and three boys.  The children attend school.  Etelinda  has a lot of experience with agriculture since she was interested in learning about it from a very early age. With patience and care, her parents taught her the proper techniques for planting and the maintenance required to keep the plants healthy and clean.   As a producer, the only things she has to worry about is that her crops could be lost due to a freeze (weather factors), infestation, or sicknesses.  Competition is not a problem for the sale of her products because she has customers that have supported her for many years.  Her crops are located on the same property where her house is located, so she can care for and maintain her crops personally. Her plan for the future is to cultivate a better variety of coffee which would allow her to compete in the national and international market. Her dream for her business and her family is to increase production, as mentioned before, and for her children to complete their educations so they can become professionals with college degrees and have better opportunities in their lives. The loan she is requesting today is for the purchase of agricultural supplies that she will use to take care of her crops.  This will provide her with a good crop and better income to support her family and her home.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Seupule

texts.en: Seupule is a 20-year-old married woman with no children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Seupule has requested a loan to buy gallons, chemicals, a weed sprayer and taro roots. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Seupule hopes to improve her house and support her family.

loans.use: to buy gallons, chemicals, a weed sprayer, and taro roots

loans.name: Aiulu

texts.en:
Aiulu is 24 years old and is married with 1 child. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy a bag of sugar, baking soda, a bag of flour, fryer and shopping bags. 

In the future, Aiulu hopes to support her family and to expand her business. Aiulu joined SPBD in October 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a bag of sugar, baking soda, a bag of flour, fryer and shopping bags

loans.name: Toavalu

texts.en:
Toavalu is 57 years old and is married with 6 children. She has a small business raising and selling chicken in her community. She has been in this business for 6 years.

Toavalu needs a loan to buy wire, posts, chicken feed and to buy an iron roof for home improvement. She will use her profits to pay for her children's education and to expand her business. Toavalu joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy wire, posts, chicken feed and to buy an iron roof for home improvement

loans.name: Safua

texts.en: Safua is a 53-year-old married woman with 5 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. Safua has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed-sprayer, a bag of fertilizer and bush knives. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Safua hopes to save more for unexpected emergencies and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weedsprayer, a bag of fertilizer and bush knives

loans.name: Angelina Del Carmen

texts.es: Angelina del Carmen 34 años de edad casada con un hijo mejor de edad aun bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, es una microempresaria la cual posee en su casa de habitación una panadería donde solamente elabora pan dulce y reposterías como: picos, maletas, prisioneros, empanadas, semitas, enrollados, tortas de leche, entre otros, sus compras son al contado en casas comerciales, mercados y otros, sus ventas son al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales los que recupera a diario o al día siguiente, se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora con muchos deseos de superación personal el cual lucha día a día para sacar adelante a su hijo, uno de sus sueños es poder ver a su hijo todo un profesional al igual que ver termina de construir sus casa y brindarle las mejores condiciones de vida a su pequeño hijo. el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de productos de consumo como: harina, azúcar, manteca, queso, piña, entre otros al igual que el de mejorar el area del horno donde produce los deliciosos manjares de reposterías, y pan dulce.
texts.en: Angelina del Carmen is 34 years old.  She is married with one minor son for whom she is still responsible.  She is from one of the towns in Chinnandega, located in the western part of the country.  She is a small business owner and, located in her home, is her bakery where she prepares sweet bread and pastries such as “picos” [triangular pastries with a cheese and sugar filling],  “maletas”[jelly roll made of a butter and lard-based crust stuffed with minced pork, raisins, capers, and hardboiled eggs], “prisioneros” [pastry sometimes made with pineapple],”empanadas” [ground meat inside a dough or pastry], “semitas” [a tart of bread dough filled with jam or other rich fillings],” enrollados” [rolled pastry with various fillings], “tortas de leche” [bread pudding] and other baked goods.  She makes cash purchases at stores, markets, and other places of business.  She has regular and occasional customers and sells on cash and credit, collecting payment daily or the following day.  She is characterized as an enterprising woman with a strong personal desire to succeed and she strives daily to get her son ahead.  She dreams of being able to see her child become a professional as well as completing construction of her home and providing her small son with better living conditions.  The purpose if this loan is to invest in working capital to purchase consumer products such as wheat, sugar, butter, cheese, pineapples, and other products as well as improve the oven area where she prepares the delicious pastries and sweet bread.

loans.use: to purchase consumer products such as wheat, butter, sugar, cheese, meat, and other items.

loans.name: Jesus Manuel

texts.es: Jesús tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos de 13 años y 5 años de edad. Desde muy pequeño aprendió a cultivar la tierra y el oficio de la pesca. De esta forma se gana la vida honradamente y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar por lo que no percibe un ingreso por su trabajo. Habitan en condiciones muy humildes y poco a poco han venido mejorando sus condiciones. Para él lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que trabaja duramente para darles mejores condiciones. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en encementar el piso ya que en la actualidad es de tierra y no es muy higiénico. Además, desea construir una Letrina Abonera ya que la que tenía ya no funciona. Con el crédito comprará cemento, arena, grava, hierro y ladrillo para iniciar lo antes posible la construcción de la Letrina Abonera y el encementado del piso.
texts.en:
Jesús is 41 and lives in his own home with his wife and children, 13 and 15 years old.  From a very young age he learned to cultivate the land and the trade of fishing.  In this way he has honorably earned a living and supports his family.  His wife works at home and so receives no income.  They live in very simple conditions bit by bit have been improving their conditions.

For him the most important is family and it is for them that he works hard to give them the best conditions.  He wants to improve the conditions at home and that is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in cementing the floor since currently it is made of dirt and is not very hygienic.  He also wants to build a composting toilet since the one he had no longer works.  

With the load he will buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and brick to begin constructing the composting toilet and cementing the floor as soon as possible.

loans.use:
to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and bricks for build a composting toilet and cementing the floor.

 cemento, arena, grava, hierro y ladrillo para la construcción de la Letrina Abonera y el encementado del piso.

loans.name: Nem

texts.en:
Nem is an industrious farmer and a widowed woman from a rural village in Baray district, Kampong Thom province. She has four children, three of whom are married and live independently. Nem has been engaging in farming to make a living and also sells breakfast (Khmer noodle with soup) from her home for additional income. From the current businesses, she can make approximately 6.40 USD per day.

As this will be her eighth loan cycle, Nem will use this loan to build a safe latrine to improve the household's sanitation and personal hygiene. With the financial support of the loan, Nem hopes that everyone in her family can live a comfortable lifestyle. Thanks to the water loan program offered by HKL with a special interest rate, she is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a safe latrine to improve the household's sanitation and personal hygiene.

loans.name: Oneone

texts.en:
Oneone is a 47-year-old married woman with children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and ta'amu to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 10 years. 

Oneone has requested a loan to buy a bag of fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Oneone hopes to save more for her children's education and to improve her plantation.

loans.use: to buy a bag of fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives and chemicals

loans.name: Edith Del Carmen

texts.es:
Edith de 21 años de edad,  estudio hasta noveno grado, por la condición económica de su familia no pudo seguir estudiando, ella está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como motorista en una comercial, su hija de dos años por su edad aún no estudia.

Ella se dedica a vender frutas y verduras a pie, con un guacal en la cabeza, tiene cerca de 11 años de dedicarse a este negocio y lo aprendió a de su madre; pues ella se dedica a lo mismo. Edith vende en los cantones aledaños a su residencia, sale a las 4 de la mañana a comprar, ya que a esa hora se encuentran frutas y verduras fresca y cómodas, aparte de eso le ayuda al padre a trabajar en la agricultura, pues el padre siembra maíz y maicillo ella tiene hora de entrada pero no tiene hora de salida.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar frutas y verduras, con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos; ya que podrá comprar más mercaderías y aunque trabajara mas, pero está segura de que obtendrá mejores ingresos económicos.

En un futuro se ve con un puesto fijo en el mercado, para no andar en la calle vendiendo y espera que su hija no sufra las necesidades que ella sufrió, ya que por medio de los prestamos podrá lograr ese impulso que ella necesita.
texts.en:
Edith is 21 years old.  She attended school through the ninth grade but due to her family's financial situation she cold not continue.  She is in a relationship and her partner works as a driver at a business.  Her daughter is two years old, and does not yet attend school due to her age. 

She sells fruit and vegetables on foot, with a guacal (gourd bowl) on her head.  She has done this type of work for 11 years and learned it from her mother, who also does the same work.  Edith sells in the cantons near her home.  She leaves at 4am to buy produce, as this is the hour when the fruit and vegetables are freshest.  She also helps her father who works in agriculture.  He plants corn and maize.  She has a time she starts work, but she doesn't have a fixed time when she finishes. 

The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase fruit and vegetables, with the goal of increasing her income.  This will allow her to purchase more merchandise.  Even though she will have to work more, she is sure she will obtain better income. 

In the future she sees herself with a fixed stall in the market, so she doesn't have to walk through the streets selling.  She hopes that her daughter does not suffer the way she did.  With the loans she can achieve the momentum that she needs.

loans.use: to purchase fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Bernarda Del Socorro

texts.es: Bernarda, a sus 63 años de edad,  es casada y madre de tres hijos. Siempre ha sido ama de casa y dependía económicamente de su esposo pero, ya cuando sus hijos crecieron y comenzaron a trabajar, ella tomó la iniciativa de buscar una actividad para realizar y percibir sus propios ingresos y fue así como comenzó a vender mercancía como ropa, calzado, cremas corporales, perfumería, entre otros; los primeros productos que tuvo para ofrecer se los regaló su hijo mayor que vive en el extranjero y con las ganancias que obtenía fue invirtiendo y poco a poco iba creciendo el inventario y la clientela, pues además de ofrecer a sus familiares y vecinos, también tenía clientes en las empresas en las que trabajan sus otros dos hijos, de esta manera generaba los ingresos suficientes para sus gastos personales y para aportar a la economía del hogar, ella realizó esta actividad por aproximadamente 8 años, pero por falta de capital de trabajo, ésta se vio interrumpida. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de reactivar el negocio y comprar mercancía al por mayor (blusas, jeans, camisas, tennis, calzado en general, perfumería, juguetería, entre otros) y cancelar el saldo de un crédito que tiene vigente; esto le permitirá tener gran variedad de surtido para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada decembrina, en la que sus ventas se duplican pues cuenta con la ventaja de vender productos de marcas reconocidas que a sus clientes les gusta, mejorando así el nivel de ingresos que recibe. Bernarda, con su perseverancia, carisma y buena energía desea seguir trabajando en su negocio y continuar percibiendo ingresos para darse sus propios gustos, además quiere adquirir un apartamento bien ubicado para pasar una vejez más tranquila al lado de su esposo y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Bernarda is 63 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She had always been a stay-at-home mom and depended on her husband economically, but once her children were grown and working themselves, she took the initiative to find an activity to earn her own income. In this way she began selling merchandise such as clothing, shoes, lotions and perfumes. The first products she sold were given to her by her oldest son who lives abroad, and bit-by-bit she invested her earnings from those products into more inventory for the business. Her clientele also grew: in addition to selling to her family members and neighbors, she also had clients in the businesses where her other children work. In this manner she generated sufficient income to cover her personal expenses and to help with household expenses. She ran this business for 8 years, but because she lacked working capital, her business was interrupted.

She is currently requesting a loan to reactivate the business and purchase merchandise in bulk (blouses, jeans, shirts, tennis shoes and other shoes, perfumes, games, etc.) and to pay off the remaining balance of a current loan. This will allow her to have a wide variety of merchandise to satisfy the demand which grows in the month of December. Her advantage is that she sells the name brand products her clients like, which increases her level of earnings. Bernarda, with her perseverance, charisma and good energy hopes to continue working in her business and continue receiving income to spend as she likes. She would also like to buy an apartment in a good location to spend her old age comfortably, at the side of her husband and her sons.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk and to repay a current loan.

loans.name: Balbina

texts.en: Balbina is  taking a loan of 600 USD to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as vegetables. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of 100 USD.  She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Ma. Annie

texts.en: Ma. Annie is 50 years old and married with six children. Ma. Annie is in the agricultural business growing rice in the Philippines. She requested a 5000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. Ma. Annie has been farming rice for 2 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 42 years old and is married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosalinda is borrowing 15,000 PHP  through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosalinda has been raising pigs for 12 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more ingredients for her food vending business. Norma has been in this business for 12 years. She earns more income from buying and selling vegetables.

Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Conceicao

texts.en: Conceicao is applying for a loan of 600 USD to improve her business. She is running a business from her house selling vegetables and beans. She is making a good income from her business  and she wants to buy more needed items with the loan. She is living in a town near by the main road, so many people come to buy her vegetables and she is open every day. She opened her business two years ago with her own working capital of 50 USD.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and beans

loans.name: Gladys Ondina

texts.es:
Gladys es una joven muy trabajadora de 29 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos que viven con ella y le ayudan a trabajar en sus cultivos de café. El grado educativo de Gladys es primaria incompleta cursado hasta el cuarto grado la cual no pudo terminar por más esfuerzo que hicieron sus padres ya que desciende de una familia de escasos recursos económicos. Gladys desde hace 11 años se dedica a la agricultura particularmente al cultivo de café ya que esta actividad la aprendió con sus padres desde niña. El terreno donde hoy en día tienen su finca fue una herencia de sus padres el cual está ubicado a 40 minutos de camino desde sus casa de habitación donde trabaja arduamente para limpiar y cuidar su cultivo ya que teme que alguna plaga se los dañe, sin embargo ella es optimista y afirma que obtendrá una excelente cosecha de café.
Por lo que  ella necesita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para dar asistencia técnica a su cultivo de café como ser compra de abono, foliares, fertilizantes entre otros. Ella sueña con hacer crecer su finca, sembrar y cultivar plantación nueva de café ya que es la única forma de asegurar el futuro de su familia y la situación económica cada día es precaria; además ella enseña a sus hijos a trabajar para que sean personas de bien y para que valoren el esfuerzo que ella hace por salir adelante y tener una vida digna.
texts.en:
Gladys is a hard working young woman who is 29 years old.  She is a single mother of 2 children who live with her and help her with her work cultivating coffee.  Gladys did not complete primary school.  She attended school through the fourth grade, but was not able to finish despite all of her parents' efforts because she comes from a family with scarce financial resources.  

For the past 11 years, Gladys has worked in agriculture, in particular growing coffee. This is an activity she learned as a girl from her parents. The land where they have their coffee plantation was inherited from her parents and is located 40 minutes from her house on foot.  She works hard to clean and care for her crop, as she fears that an infestation could damage it. Nevertheless, she is optimistic and sure she will have an excellent coffee crop.

She needs a loan to purchase agricultural supplies to support her coffee crop, such as fertilizers and leaf fertilizers.  She dreams of growing her plot; planting and cultivating new coffee plants is the only way to secure the future for her family and her daily financial situation is precarious.  She is also teaching her children to work so that they are good people and value the hard work that she does in order to get by and have a decent life.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to help keep her coffee crop healthy.

loans.name: Gina Lucia

texts.es:
Gina es una joven de 27 años de edad, para poder salir adelante logro iniciar su negocio de salón de belleza, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para salir adelante, ella trabaja alrededor d e10 horas al día y cree que le va bien porque es muy amable con sus clientes.

Gina está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda podrá comprar una maquina de vaporización facial y podrá comprar implementos como tijeras, plancha de cabellos, entre otros así poder atender mejor a sus clientes y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Gina is a 27 year old young adult. In order to get ahead she managed to open a beauty salon which generates the revenue she needs to carry on. She works about 10 hours a day and feels that it is going well for her because she is friendly with her customers.

Gina is very grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their help she can buy a facial machine and buy tools like scissors, a hair iron etc. She can take better care of her clients and continue to struggle to realize her dream, which is to own her own house.

loans.use: to buy a facial machine, tools, etc.

loans.name: Las Pascuas Sisil Group

texts.es:
La señora Oneida Porfiria es unida de hecho. De edad 35 años. Curso 3 años de educacion primaria. Se dedica a la crianza de animales domésticos. Inició este negocio con unos animalitos y hata la fecha lleva 6 años de experiencia. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de cerdos y pollos y concentrado para los mismos. Desea en el futuro contar con una granja con diferentes animales domestico y contar con un capital propio.

Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales domésticos.
texts.en:
